126a5(mdo sde): rab ni dper ni sman chen gyi lta bu gang yin pa don shes rab kyi ste/'dri dag ni spro ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug grung
126a6(mdo sde): zhe na/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi khyim rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//dmigs pa med pa rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//
126a7(mdo sde): sa rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o//bsgom pa'i stobs can gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//nges pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan
126b1(mdo sde): gyi'o//bya ba thams cad du thun mong ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la mtshan ma med pa'i pha
126b2(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/dus thams cad du mtshan ma med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//thams cad pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//zil gyis
126b3(mdo sde): ma non po gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//rgyun mi chad pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//yongs su
126b4(mdo sde): gcod par byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni mtshan ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la smon pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na//
126b5(mdo sde): smon pa med par myur du thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//chags pa med pa rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//khams gsum la mngon par mi
126b6(mdo sde): blta ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//bar mo dor chud mi zla ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//thar pa la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//
126b7(mdo sde): bag chags 'don pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni smon pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la gzhan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/byang
127a1(mdo sde): chub snying por skyil mo krung gcig gis sku ma dub pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//sku gzi byin dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//
127a2(mdo sde): chos mngon par brjod pa glang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//chos mngon par brjod cing phyin ci ma ldog par rtogs pa glang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//thar
127a3(mdo sde): pa 'dzin pa glang yin pa de ni brasam gtan gyi'o//sgyu mar rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni gzhan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de
127a4(mdo sde): la rnam par smin pa gzhan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/tshong pa ga gon gyis mchod ston gsol ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//klu btang zung gis dkris
127a5(mdo sde): te bzhugs pa gang yin pa dri ni tshul khrims kyi'o//tshangs pa nye bar 'ongs nas gsol ba 'debs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
127a6(mdo sde): gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//gdul ba rnams la yang dang yang gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsdam gtan gyi'o//gti mug me pa'i chos
127a7(mdo sde): kyi 'khor lo bskor nga na/'di ltar gcig nas gcig tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra mngon par grags pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni
127b1(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa gzhan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la sbyor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/lnga po dag nye bar 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//
127b2(mdo sde): bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa de ni thos na sngo dang du ldan pa gang yin po de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//lhags pa'i nga rgyal med pas nye bar gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o///
127b3(mdo sde): bdud rtsis tshim par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//lnga po dag la bka' stsol cing gro bar mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//lha bye ba
127b4(mdo sde): phrag lnga po dag la bdud rtsi rtogs par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni sbyor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i
127b5(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/gnas dang gnas ma yin pa nyid thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//dam bcas pa gzhan du mi 'gyur pa gang yin pa de ni tshul
127b6(mdo sde): khrims kyi'o//yang dag par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//dam bcas pa stobs can gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//smra ba gzhan du mi 'gyur
127b7(mdo sde): ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//dus shes nas sgom pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug
128a1(mdo sde): go/de la 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i las yang dag par blang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/lus kyi skye ba la
128a2(mdo sde): rtog pa glang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//lus kyi rgyu las rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//rkyen la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o//las
128a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi spong ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson+da 'grus kyi'o//spong ba'i thabs la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//spyong bya'i skye ba med pa la rtog
128a4(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i las yang dag par blang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//
128a5(mdo sde): de la 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/sems can rnams kyi khams la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//khams tha
128a6(mdo sde): dad pa ma yin pa lnga rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//khams la sems can med par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//khams kyi sbyor
128a7(mdo sde): ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//khams rab tu bsgrub pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//khams kyi nges par byung ba
128b1(mdo sde): la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa
128b2(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/lus rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce rtogs pa gang yin
128b3(mdo sde): pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//sems rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//pho'i dbang po dang /mo'i dbang po dang /srog gi dbang po dang /bde ba'i
128b4(mdo sde): dbang po dang /sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang /yid bde ba'i dbang po dang /yid mi badre ba'i dbang po dang /btang snyoms kyi dbang po ste/dbang po drug po
128b5(mdo sde): 'di dag rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//dad pa'i dbang po nas shes rab kyi dbang po'i bar du rtog pa gang yin pa de ni/bsam gtan gyi'o//kun
128b6(mdo sde): shes pa'i dbang po dang /kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/'di dag ni dbang po yongs su
128b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la 'jig rten gyi mos pa du ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/mos pa la sbyor ba yang dag par grub pa gang yin pa
129a1(mdo sde): 'brel par rtogs pag yin padi ni byas ma tan gyi'o//'gro ba dang 'brel la yod pa dang med par rtogs pa gung yi pa napa
129a2(mdo sde): byams pa rje 'gro ba'i lam gyi la sbyin ba rgyun/dul phreng ba dang /hrIs sa kyi da na
129b1(mdo sde): par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/chos 'di rnams kyi bde ba 'di nges pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//
129b2(mdo sde): cang shes pa mtshungs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//gzhan la phan+da par yongs su bsngos pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//bdag la phan
129b3(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//snod ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//rgyu mthun pa rtogs pa glung yin pa de ni shes rab kyi
129b4(mdo sde): ste/de dag ni dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par
129b5(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/sngon gyi gnas lus kyis rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni
129b6(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i 'o//'gro bo rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//las kyi mtha' rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//nyon mongs pa rtogs pa gang yin pa
129b7(mdo sde): do ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//sems rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//rnam pa thams cad pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ji snyed pa kun yang dag par mthong
130a1(mdo sde): ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la lha'i mig gi pha rol tu phyin
130a2(mdo sde): pa drug grang zhe na/lha'i mig dang ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//sbyor ba kha ni ma the ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//thag ring por mthong
130a3(mdo sde): bA gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o//ma lus par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//chud pa dang /dwer blo dang /bkur sti med pa mthong ba gang
130a4(mdo sde): yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//de dag gi nges par byung ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni lha'i mig gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la
130a5(mdo sde): zlazag pa zad pa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/zag pa'i skyon mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//zag pa rnams la mngon por mi dga' ba gang
130a6(mdo sde): yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//zag pa rnams la mi blta zhing sems kyis gtong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o//zag pa rnams la mi rtog par rtogs pa
130a7(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//zag pa rnams kyi yang dag pa yongs su shes nas spong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//zag pa rnams kyi bag
130b1(mdo sde): chags kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni zag pa zad pa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la yang drag
130b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o zhes mi 'jigs pa dang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/sangs rgyas rig
130b3(mdo sde): par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//dam bcas pa ma zhum pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//yang dag par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i
130b4(mdo sde): 'o//thams cad thugs su chud pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thugs su chud pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//
130b5(mdo sde): 'khor brgyad kyi nang na bag tsha ba mi mnga' zhing dam bcas pa brtan po gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa dang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/
130b6(mdo sde): de la yang dag par zag pa zad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/zag pa zad pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//bag chags sel ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims
130b7(mdo sde): kyi'o//skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod po'i 'o//yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//dam bcas pa la 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi
131a1(mdo sde): g.yos pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//rnam par grol ba la nyams pa med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni mi
131a2(mdo sde): 'jigs pa gnyis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la nges par 'byin pa'i lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/lam thabs la rtog pa gang yin pa de
131a3(mdo sde): ni sbyin pa'i'o//'thob par byed pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//'grog pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o//'jug par byed pa
131a4(mdo sde): la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//rab tu 'jog par byed pa la rtog pa glang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//rnam par grol bar byed pa la rtog pa
131a5(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa gsum pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la bar du gcod pa'i chos kyi gtam gyi pha rol tu phyin
131a6(mdo sde): pa drug gang zhe na/bar du gcod pa rnams la skye ba med par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//ma skyes par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//chags
131a7(mdo sde): pa med par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'o'o//dar du gcod pa rnams kyi kho na ma tho ba med pa lo rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//bar du
131b1(mdo sde): gcod pa rnams la the tshom med par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//bar du gcod pa rnams la chung ngu dang /'bring dang /chen pos nges pa dang /ma
131b2(mdo sde): nges par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni bar du gcod pa'i chos kyi gtam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go///'phags pa bskal pa
131b3(mdo sde): bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po brgyad pa//de la snying rje chen po'i pha rol tu phyin po drug gang zhe na/sems can la phan pa dang ldan pa'i
131b4(mdo sde): snying rje chen po gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//sems mnyam pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//sems tsan+da rnams la gnod pa dang du len pa gang yin pa de ni
131b5(mdo sde): bzod pa'i 'o//sems can nye bar 'ong ba rnams thar par byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//mos pa ji lta ba bzhin yon tan la 'jog pa gang yin pa de ni
131b6(mdo sde): bsam gtan gyi'o//'khor ba las grol bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni snying rje chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la sha'i spyan yongs
131b7(mdo sde): su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/sa'i khams dang /chu'i khams gnyis dang ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'o'o//me'i khams dang /rlung gi
132a1(mdo sde): khams gnyis kyis brtan nas gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//rlung dang /mkhris pa dang /bad kan rnams 'dres pa'i
132a2(mdo sde): skyon gyis ma 'khrugs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//spyan lta na sdug pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//rigs par gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni
132a3(mdo sde): bosam gtan gyi'o//ma lus par gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni sha'i spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/
132a4(mdo sde): de la lha'i spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/lha'i spyan gyis gzugs kyi lus gzigasngo pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin po'i'o//nam mkha'
132a5(mdo sde): lus gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//rgud pa gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//dar ba gzigs pa gang yin po de ni brtson 'grus
132a6(mdo sde): kyi'o//rgyu gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//so sor gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni lha'i spyan yongs su sbyong
132a7(mdo sde): bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la shes rab kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/bsgoms pas 'grub pa'i
132b1(mdo sde): shes rab kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//mya ngan las 'das pa thar pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//mngon par brjod pa la
132b2(mdo sde): gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//gzigs pa la rab tu gnas pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//blta bar bye ba la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
132b3(mdo sde): gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//'jug pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni shes rab kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha
132b4(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la chos kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de ni sbyin
132b5(mdo sde): pa'i'o//de dag 'thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//rnam par gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//ngo bo gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus
132b6(mdo sde): kyi'o//sbyor ba gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//chung mi za bar gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni chos kyi spyan yongs su spong
132b7(mdo sde): bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la sangs rgyas kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi spyan slob pa med pas
133a1(mdo sde): gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//phan par gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//rnam par gzigs pa gang yin pa de
133a2(mdo sde): ni bzod pa'i'o//ngo bo gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//sbyor ba gzigs pa gang yin pa de na bsam gtan gyi'o//rnam par dben pa gzigs
133a3(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug
133a4(mdo sde): grang zhe na/rang byung lhun gyis grub par gnas pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//bosam pa ji lta ba bzhin gnas pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//rang
133a5(mdo sde): gi spong ba'i rgyu rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o//rab tu dbye ba shes pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//rnam pa thams cad la nye bar rtog
133a6(mdo sde): pa gang yin po de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//ji lta ba bzhin thams cad shes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug
133a7(mdo sde): go/de la rnam par rol pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pas rnam par 'phrul pa ni dper na chu bo gang+gAr gdugs lnga brgya lta bu gang
133b1(mdo sde): yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//grong khyer du gshegs pa na sems can rnams bde bar gyur pa dang /sil snyan rnams ma dkrol bar sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims
133b2(mdo sde): kyi'o//dbang po mtshung ba tshang ba dang 'di gsal ba rab tu 'thob pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//'od zer mtha' yas pa 'gyed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//
133b3(mdo sde): yul yangs pa can gyi phyi dang nang logs su sangs rgyas brgyad khri bzhi stong sprul pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//'khor brgyad po rnams la dus su chos ston
133b4(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni rnam par rol pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la gting dpag dka' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/spyod pa
133b5(mdo sde): la tshad gzung bar mi nus pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen par dka' ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//bsam pa tshod mi
133b6(mdo sde): za zhing 'dzin pa la pha rol gnon pa ni dper no gnod sbyin 'dul zhing glang po che nor skyong dang /sbrul gdug pa btul nas 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa sbyin no zhes tshig gis smras
133b7(mdo sde): pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//'od zer can du maut+pal gyi bu chen po'i ma btul ba dang /tshur gshegs pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nang du lhung bzed kyi chu
134a1(mdo sde): pho ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//shA ri'i bus smras pa/sems bzhi skyes nas zhig go//smras pa/tshad med pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//
134a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pas nam phyed na phrin las mdzad par gyur pa ni glan ma lcags phob kyang grong khyer gyi mi dad pa rnams btul nas/sang ni ngas
134a3(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa drug gi chos bshad par bya'o zhes pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni gting dpag dka' bo'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la sangs rgyas kyi
134a4(mdo sde): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi drug chen bco brgyad glang zhe na/de la ca tso med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/'di ltar rgya cher ston pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//'od
134a5(mdo sde): mngon par 'du byed pa rnam pa gsum ston pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//gzhan gyi rgyud dag la gnod sems med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//bsam
134a6(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba bzhin tshim par byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//sbrang ma'i sbrang N+DI myong bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//rjes su chags pa
134a7(mdo sde): dang /khong khro ba dang bral bar ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni tso co med po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la bsnyel ba med pa'i pha
134b1(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/dran pa rgyun mi 'chad pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//ji lta ba bzhin yongs su bsngo ba'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//
134b2(mdo sde): sbyor ba kho na ma zhi ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o//chos thams cad mngon par go bar mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni brdzun 'grus kyi'o//dus gsum du ma
134b3(mdo sde): bobasnyel ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//gsung rab ma bsnyel ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni bsnyel ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/
134b4(mdo sde): de lce sems mnyam par bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/sems la skye ba med par mtshungs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//zhen pa med pa gang yin pa
134b5(mdo sde): de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//phrad pas chog shes pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o//gzhan la phan pa rnam par dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//sems
134b6(mdo sde): tshuchur bcad cing kun tu 'dzin pa nye bar sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//dus thams cad du byasam pa ji lta ba bzhin lhun gyis grub par gnas pa gang yin pa
134b7(mdo sde): de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni sems mnyam par bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la so sor ma rtags pa'i btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang
135a1(mdo sde): zhe na/bsdam pa grub pa btang snyoms pa grang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//pha rol po gzhan la rag lus pa la btang snyoms pa gang yin pa de ni
135a2(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi'o//snying rje'i yo byad btang snyoms pa ni dper na byang chub kyi snying po lta bu gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//thams cad btang snyoms ma gtugs
135a3(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//chos ston pa na btang snyoms pa grang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//chos bshad pa byas nas lus kyis gdams
135a4(mdo sde): ngag ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/'di drag ni so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la tha dad pa
135a5(mdo sde): med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug glang zhe na/tha dad po'i 'du shes kyis mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//de bzhin nyid du 'du shes pas phyin ci ma log
135a6(mdo sde): par skye ba gang yin po de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//yod pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o//bdag gi lus drang gzhan gyi lus la 'khrul
135a7(mdo sde): pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//dus shes pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//thams cad de'i ngo bo ma yin pa gang yin pa de
135b1(mdo sde): ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni tha dad pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la 'dun pa yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug grang zhe na/pha rol la
135b2(mdo sde): phan par 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//bdag la phan par 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//chos kyi gzhi la 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o///
135b3(mdo sde): dus thams cad du 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//sred pa spong bra la 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//ma rig pa spong ba la 'dun pa gang
135b4(mdo sde): yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni 'dun pa yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu
135b5(mdo sde): phyin pa drug gang zhe na/thams cad du song ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//gzhan dad par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o///
135b6(mdo sde): gogadul ba'i dus la sdod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//chos lta ba mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//yig 'bru ston pa zad mi shes pa gang yin pa
135b7(mdo sde): deni bsam gtan gyi'o//don ma gdugs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/
136a1(mdo sde): de la dran pa yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/dran pa lnga rnyog pa med pa'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//
136a2(mdo sde): thag ring po dran pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//rigs pa ji lci ba bzhi ni dran pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//mos pa ji lta ba bzhin drin pa gang yin
136a3(mdo sde): pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//'jug par byed pa'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//yongs su gcod pa'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di
136a4(mdo sde): dag ni dran pa yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/tshad med pa
136a5(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//yang dag pa'i spong ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//dran
136a6(mdo sde): pa nye bar bzhag pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin grang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni brtson
136a7(mdo sde): 'grus kyi'o//bsam gtan yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//bden pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa
136b1(mdo sde): de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la shes rab yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug
136b2(mdo sde): gang zhe na/dbang po yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//stobs yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//byang
136b3(mdo sde): chub kyi yan lag yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//lam yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//rten cing
136b4(mdo sde): 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//stobs bcu yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/
136b5(mdo sde): 'di dag ni shes rab yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug grang zhe na/lus
136b6(mdo sde): nyam chung ba yongs su nyams pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//tshogs kyi nang na gnas pas yongs su nyams pa med pa gang yin po de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//ma
136b7(mdo sde): 'dres par gnas pas yongs su nyams pa med pa gang yon pa de ni bzod pa'i'o//gzhan gyi gnas thob par byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//zad pa shes
137a1(mdo sde): pas legs par byas pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//mi skye ba shes pas brag chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di
137a2(mdo sde): dag ni rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
137a3(mdo sde): drug gang zhe na/bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin rnam par grol ba yau shes mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//sdom pa med par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul
137a4(mdo sde): khrims kyi'o//'dod par 'gyur ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//sa dang su ma yin po'i 'bras bu rnam par bzhag pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus
137a5(mdo sde): kyi'o//skye ba rnam par bzhag pa la mi slob pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//chos gos kyi tha mas khyer ba na yongs su nyams pa med pa'i shes rab rnam
137a6(mdo sde): par grol po gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la
137a7(mdo sde): lus kyi las ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/lus kyi las ma 'khrul pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//lus kyi las nges pa
137b1(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//bag chags kyis 'gyur ba med pa grang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//gcig tu dge ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//skye bo
137b2(mdo sde): mang po la rnam par smin pa grang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//lus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis gdams ngagra ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'od dag ni lus kyi las
137b3(mdo sde): ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la ngag gi lngas yo shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/ngag 'khrul pa med par 'byung
137b4(mdo sde): ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//thams cad du song ba'i dbyangs gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//'khor dga' bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//kun
137b5(mdo sde): tu sgrogs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//mos par 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//re ba lnga ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag
137b6(mdo sde): noni ngag gi lAs ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la yid kyi las ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/yid kyi las
137b7(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis rgyun mi chad pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//so sor rtags pa sgrub pa gang
138a1(mdo sde): yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal spong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//gti mug dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni bsam
138a2(mdo sde): gtan gyi'o//tshad med pas gnas pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni yid kyi las ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la
138a3(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/khams la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//phung po la rtog pa gang
138a4(mdo sde): yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//skye mched la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o//las la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//nyon mongs pa la
138a5(mdo sde): rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//sems la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong
138a6(mdo sde): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/'gro ba tha dad par rtog pa gang yin
138a7(mdo sde): pa de ni sbyin pa'o'o//lta ba tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//gang zag tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//sbyor ba tha dad
138b1(mdo sde): par rtog pa glang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//skye ba tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//rnam par smin pa tha dad par rtog pa glang yin pa de ni shes rab
138b2(mdo sde): kyi ste/'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la de ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha
138b3(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi bya ba shes pa gang yin pa don sbyin pa'i'o//mya ngan las 'dus pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//
138b4(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//'gog pa mthong po gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//mngon sum du bya ba mthong ba gang yin pa
138b5(mdo sde): de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la chud za ba med pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni dra ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs pa'i ye
138b6(mdo sde): shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/thabs mkhas pas dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//skyon dang bral
138b7(mdo sde): bar sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//thams cad du thogs pa med pa gang yin po de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//
139a1(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi mos pa 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//bde ba tshad med pa la 'jug pa thob par byed pa gang yin pa de ni
139a2(mdo sde): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/'di dag ni mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la ji lta ba bzhin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/chos thams
139a3(mdo sde): cad mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//dngos po brgyad mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//lta ba gsal
139a4(mdo sde): bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//gdul bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//nye bar sgrub pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o///
139a5(mdo sde): brda la nges pa'i tshig 'jug par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la rang bzhin mthong ba'i pha rol
139a6(mdo sde): tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/mi dmyigs pas yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni dper na mar me mdzad lta bu'i gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//lus la mi lta ba ni dper
139a7(mdo sde): na zla 'od kyis bden pa gang gis nga'i mig ces smras pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//chos thams cad mnyam po nyid du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i
139b1(mdo sde): 'o//ljongs kyi nges pa'i tshig mthong bar khong du chud pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//snying brtse ba mi gtong bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//
139b2(mdo sde): gnyis su med pas gnas pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/'di dag ni rang bzhin mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la 'dod pa na spyod
139b3(mdo sde): pi'i las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/'dod pa na spyod pa'i las dman pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//'bring mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o///
139b4(mdo sde): chen po mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//las zad par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//las zad par sbyor bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam
139b5(mdo sde): gtan gyi'o//las zad par sbyor bar mi skye bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/'di dag ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//
139b6(mdo sde): de la gzugs na spyod pa'i las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/gzugs kyi rnam par smin po mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//gzugs kyi rgyu mthong ba gang
139b7(mdo sde): yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//skye ba'i los mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//skye ba'i las kyi rnam par rtog po mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus
140a1(mdo sde): kyi'o//rnam par smin pa gsal ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsamA gtan gyi'o//dman pa dang dman pa ma yin par mthong ba gang
140a2(mdo sde): yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/'di dag ni gzugs na spyod pa'i las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i las kyi
140a3(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o sa yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//rnam pa la rtog po gang yin pa
140a4(mdo sde): de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//dmigs pa la rtog pa glang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//dmigasmra
140a5(mdo sde): pa shin tu sbyangs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//tha dad pa med par ston par mthong ba nas nges par 'byung ba mthong ba'i bar gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi
140a6(mdo sde): ste/'odi dag ni gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i lus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/dkar
140a7(mdo sde): po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la re ba med po gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//mtshan ma med pa rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//rgyun mi chad pa
140b1(mdo sde): glang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o//rnam par lta ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//kun tu 'phel ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//dkar po rnam par mthong
140b2(mdo sde): byi'i sa la chos su 'du shes shrIng sems can gyi 'du shes med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/'di dag nI dkar bu rnam par mthong ba'i sa'i pa
140b3(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la rigs kyi chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/rigs kyi chos mthong ba gong yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//'bring po mthong ba gang yin pa de
140b4(mdo sde): ni tshul khrims kyi'o//sred par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//rigs las ma nyams pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//rigs yongs su rdzogs pa
140b5(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//brgyud pa'i chos rab tu 'thob pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/'di dag ni rigs kyi chos kyi pha
140b6(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la brgyad pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/brgyad pa dang pa'i rjes su 'brang ba gang phyin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//brgyad pa chos kyi
140b7(mdo sde): rjes su 'brang po gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//bskyod pa skyo ba gang yin pa de ni bzad pa'i'o//brgyad pa dgra bcom pa stan gcig pa gang yin po de ni brtson
141a1(mdo sde): 'grus kyi'o//brgyad pa rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu gnas pa de
141a2(mdo sde): ni bsam gtan gyi'o//gnyi ga'i chu los rnam par grol ba gang gis so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/'di
141a3(mdo sde): dag ni brgyad pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyi lam la rtog pa
141a4(mdo sde): grang yin po de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'o//rno bar rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//de ltar thogasu na lan bdun pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//
141a5(mdo sde): rigs nas rigs su skye ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//bar chad gcig pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//zhugs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi
141a6(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/'di dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/lan
141a7(mdo sde): cig phyir 'ong ba la nyon mongs pa chung bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'o//nyon mongs pa rno bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims
141b1(mdo sde): kyi'o//las chung bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//las la sred par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//bul ba nyid du mthong ba gang yin pa
141b2(mdo sde): de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//lhag par sred par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug
141b3(mdo sde): go/de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug grang zhe na/'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'dod chags spong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//mi lta ba'i semasde dang dri'i
141b4(mdo sde): ngo bo ma yin pa dang phyir mi 'ong ba gang yin pa dri ni tshul khrims kyi'o//srid pa bzong por skye ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//shin tu mthong bar skye ba gang yin pa de
141b5(mdo sde): ni brtson 'grus kyingo//'og min du skye ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//skyes bu dmo pa'i 'gro ba drug gi shes pa thag rang ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
141b6(mdo sde): phyin pa'i ste/'di dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de lo dgra bcom pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/dgra bcom pa yongs su
141b7(mdo sde): nyams pa'i chos la rtog pa gong yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//dad pas mos pa gang
142a1(mdo sde): yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o//shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//lus kyis mngon du byed pa lnga
142a2(mdo sde): rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba las rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/'di dag ni
142a3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de lta rang sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/rang sangs rgyas la yid byung ba chung bar mthong ba gang
142a4(mdo sde): yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//yid byung nas 'byol ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//gcig pu la dga' ba gang yin po de ni bzod pa'i'o//thar pa la dga' ba
142a5(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//zhi gnos la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//gcig pu spobs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag
142a6(mdo sde): ni drang sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/ga yo med par sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol
142a7(mdo sde): tu phyin pa'i'o//lhag pa'i bsam pas zhugs pa'i sbyor ba ni dper na ngang pa'i skyes pa'i rabs lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//sems can thams cad
142b1(mdo sde): la sems mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o//shes pa thams cad rnam par dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//gzhan gyis bsgrags pa las
142b2(mdo sde): brten nas snyoms par 'jug pa rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//'khor bon yongs su skyob med pa'i shes pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin
142b3(mdo sde): par byed pa gang yin pa don shes rab kyi ste/'di dag na byang chub sems da pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi/de la blud pa shes pa sna rab tu phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ging
142b4(mdo sde): zhe na/zad pa shes pa la thogs pa med par sbyor ba gang yon pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//sbyor bu che phra bo gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//mtshan nyid med po la sbyor byug
142b5(mdo sde): yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o//yongs su gcod pa'i dmigs pa la sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//mI lta bar sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//
142b6(mdo sde): myi shes pa thams cad dang bral zhing shes pa thams cad rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni zad pa shes+t+ra pas rab tu phye ba'i phyi rol tu phyin pa d+ha/
142b7(mdo sde): go/de la mi skye ba shes pas rab tu phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/sred pa'i rtsa ba dgu po dag mi skye bar shes pa gang yin pa de ni smyon pa'i'o//gnod sam
143a1(mdo sde): kyi dngos po dgu mi skye bar shes pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o//rnam par
143a2(mdo sde): thar pa yongs su ma nyams pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//mi slob pa'i shes pa bcu po dag mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//yongs su gcod pa
143a3(mdo sde): la 'gyur ba med par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni mi skye ba shes pas rab tu phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la byin gyi rlabs kyi pha rol tu
143a4(mdo sde): phyin pa drug gang zhe na/dam pa'i chos ma nub kyi bar du chos thams cad gnas pa dang bstan pa lnga zang zong gis mchod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//bstan pa zil gyis
143a5(mdo sde): mya non pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//'jig rten gyi rigs bzhi dad par byed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//mngon par btsun pa 'bras bu dang bcas par
143a6(mdo sde): rtsol ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//bsam pa nges pas chos mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//'jig rten gyi chos thams cad
143a7(mdo sde): yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/'di dag ni byin gyi rlabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la lha'i mig bsgrub pa'i pha rol tu
143b1(mdo sde): byin pa drug gang zhe na/lha'i mig gis gzugs can mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//gzugs can ma yin pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//sgro
143b2(mdo sde): btags pa med par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//'khor ba'i nyes dmigs mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//nges par 'byung du mthong ba gang yin
143b3(mdo sde): pade ni bsam gtan gyi'o//nye bar zhi ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni lha'i myig bsgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la lha'i rna ba'i pha rol tu
143b4(mdo sde): phyin pa drug gang zhe na/sgra che ba nyan pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//sgra chung ba nyan pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//byams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa gang
143b5(mdo sde): yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//thabs kyi tshig sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//'du byed rnams thos nas kun tu 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//sba
143b6(mdo sde): thams cad dpyod pa la 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni lha'i rna ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang
143b7(mdo sde): zhe na/sems kyi rang bzhin mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//sems la dge ba dang mi dge bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//sems kyi rgyu dang rkyen mthong ba
144a1(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni brjod du'i'o//'das pa dang /mya 'ongs pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//du ltar byung ba la mnyam pa nyid du
144a2(mdo sde): mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsnam gtan gyi'o//thams cad du rgyu bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa'i pha rol tu

144a4(mdo sde): lho rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//'gro bar 'jug pa med pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//de lta bu la rtog pa gung yin pa de ni btsun 'grus
144a5(mdo sde): k+Shi'o//de ltar bdag med par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gautan gyi'o//rnam pas lung 'bog pa mthong ba gang yin pad+mo ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni sngon gyi gnas

144b1(mdo sde): med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//yid kyi las mi ldog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//zil gyis mi non pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag

144b5(mdo sde): yin pa dang /de ltar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni zag pa zad pa shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la spyod lam gyi phra rol tu phyin pa drug
144b6(mdo sde): gang zhe na/skye bo mang po dad par byed pa'i spyod lam gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//kun nas mdzes pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//rgyun mi chad par bltas pa
144b7(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//gom pa 'dir ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//spyod lam ma nyams pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//spyod lam ma
145a1(mdo sde): bcos pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni spyod lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la phan par 'dod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/spyod
145a2(mdo sde): pa yang bar zang zing len pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//sems can ma rungs pa dag la skyabs byed pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//mu stegs can rnams kyi gnod
145a3(mdo sde): pa bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//'di ltar gdul ba'i phyir dga' bo lha'i nang du ston pa dang /'di ltar pad+ma'i snying po'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//
145a4(mdo sde): gdul ba'i phyir bzang brtsams sgom pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//'di ltar lnga po'i nang nas kuni shes snying rjes nye bar 'ongs te chos bstan pa dang /
145a5(mdo sde): 'di ltar bden pa po lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni phan par 'dod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la nyon mongs pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
145a6(mdo sde): drug gang zhe na/nyon mongs pas yongs su skyo ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o//dbang rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//gnod sems med par gnas
145a7(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//mos pa la yon sbyong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//mngon par zhen pa med par brtag tu sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni bsam
145b1(mdo sde): gtan gyi'o//ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin gnas pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba la
145b2(mdo sde): dbang sgyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/tshe 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//bor nas gnas pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//mtshams bcad pa gang
145b3(mdo sde): yin po de ni bzod pa'i'o//lta bar song ba'i sred pa thams cad sbyangs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//sems can smin par bya ba'i phyir btang ba gang yin pa de
145b4(mdo sde): ni bsam gtan gyi'o//sems can yid byung ba rnams gdul ba'i phyir btang ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste//'di dag ni tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba la dbang sgyur ba'i pha rol
145b5(mdo sde): tu phyin pa drug go/de la mya ngan las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/len pa med par mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//sems kyis byin
145b6(mdo sde): gyis brlabs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//'od srung chen po mthong bar sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//stong gsum g.yo bar byed pa glang yin pa de ni
145b7(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyi'o//sems la 'jog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//ring bsrel sel bur klags pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni mya ngan
146a1(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//de la cho 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/phyogs tha dad pa drug tu sku gdung rnams 'thor ba gang yin pa
146a2(mdo sde): de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//sku gdung gi cho 'phrul gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//sems can rnams dang bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o//cho 'phrul la lha rnams spro
146a3(mdo sde): bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//spu zing zhes byed cing mchi ma 'dzag pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//bden pa'i tshig gis ring bsrel las cho
146a4(mdo sde): 'phrul 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni cho 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la bstan pa rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/rnyed
146a5(mdo sde): pa rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 'o//kha na ma tho ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//zil gyis gnon pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o//ji tsam du lha
146a6(mdo sde): dang mis bstan pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//bdud kyis bltar med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//bstan pa dang dral bar dga' zhing dang btsam
146a7(mdo sde): gyis mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/'di dag ni bstan pa rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de la ring
146b1(mdo sde): bsrel rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/ring bsrel rnams la yo byad kyis mchod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i'o//skye bo mang po dang
146b2(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o//ring bsil gyi mchod rten gzi byin cen grang yin po de ni bzod pa'i'o//lha drang mi rnams dga' ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o//
146b3(mdo sde): rnying bsrel gyi dmigs pa las sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o//rnying bsrel 'tshal bas spobs pa yongs su ma nyams pa
146b4(mdo sde): thob pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/'di dag ni ring bsrel rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/de dag las pha rol tu phyin pa nyis stong
146b5(mdo sde): tshig brgyu ni 'dzud tshugs spyod pa rnams la chos bstan pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa nyis stong tshi go brgya ni zhe sdang spyod pa rnams la chos bstan pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa nyis
146b6(mdo sde): stong tshig brgya ni gti mug spyod pa rnams la chos bstan pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa nyi sa stong tshig bar+d+han che mnyem par spyod pa rnams la chos bstan pa ste/de dag ni pha rol
146b7(mdo sde): tu phyin pa brgyad stong bzhi brgya'o//de dag gi ting nge 'dzin kyang brgyad stong bzhi brgya'o//de dag gi rnam pa la 'jug pa'ang stong stong ste/rnam pa brgya brgya po re re'i stong
147a1(mdo sde): stong po des na de dag gi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes bya'o//de dag gi ting nge 'dzin brgyad khri bzhi stong sgrub par byed pa ni bdag la phan par
147a2(mdo sde): brtson pa zhes bya'o//gzungs brgyad khri bzhi stong ni gzhan la phan par brtson pa ste/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir de ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo//mchog tu
147a3(mdo sde): dga' ba'i rgyal po ngas byang chub kyi snying por bdud btul te byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas nga chos la dga' ba'i rnam par smin pas zhag bdun gyi bar
147a4(mdo sde): du skyil mo krung ma bshig par 'dug pa la tshangs pas kye ma'i 'jig rten 'di ni chab 'tshal te/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos rgya chen po 'di lta bu mngon
147a5(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang thugs lngas chung ngu la thugs mngon par gzhol bar mdzad kyi/chos bstan pa'i slad du ni ma lags so zhes gsol ba btab bo//
147a6(mdo sde): de nas nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'jug pa'i dpal dang gzi brjid dag gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis mthong ngo //kha dog dang tshul bzang po dang /kha dog
147a7(mdo sde): du ma snang ba dang /sku drang por bzhugs pa dang /bkra shis pa dang /tha dad du 'gro bar 'os pa dang /kun nas mdzes pa dang /legs par gnas pa dang
147b1(mdo sde): 'od kyi kha dog mchog dang ldan pa dang /blta na sdug pa dang /bkod pa khyad par du 'phags pa dang /'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /bkod
147b2(mdo sde): pa yid du 'ong ba dang /ye shes kyi bdag nyid chen po dang /blta na dkon pa dang /gzi byin mtha' yas pa dang /snyan par grags pa dang /mkhyen bzhin du kha dog
147b3(mdo sde): mdzes par snang ba dag kyang mthong nas/de'i tshe spyan sngar 'khod do zhes dang bcas pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//bdud btul nyon mongs pa dag rnam bcom
147b4(mdo sde): zhing //stong gsum po yi sa gzhi g.yo mdzad la//ngan song sa yi sdug bsngal spangs nas kyang //byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa kun tu mdzes//lhun po ri dang
147b5(mdo sde): 'dra bar mi g.yo bar//drang po'i sku yis bde bar bzhugs mdzad la//zhing rnams kun tu 'od zer 'gyed mdzad pa//mgon po shing dbang drung na lhang ngere bzhugs//
147b6(mdo sde): skyil mo krung mchog mnyam bzhag dbang po yis//seng ge lta bu mi grayo bzhugs mdzad cing //gong na med par bdag nyid gzigs pa na//mgon po rgyal ba'i gdan
147b7(mdo sde): lo lhang nger bzhugs//ngan song srog chags sdug bsngal zhe mdzad cing //mtho ris lam dag rgya cher mdzad pa na//'jig rten las ni 'dod pa zhi mdzad pa//sA
148a1(mdo sde): la'i mchog dbang drung na lhang nger bzhugs//sbyor mnyam mnyam pa nyid kyis bzhugs mdzad cing //'jig rten phan par bden tshul dgongs pa
148a2(mdo sde): po//bden pa'i dbang phyug bstan pa dgongs pa na//mgon pa rgyal ba'i gdun la lhang nger bzhugs//dus gsum chos kyi de nyid dgongs mdzad cing //'gro
148a3(mdo sde): ba tshogs gsum dag tu mdzad pa na//bstan pa dgongs tshe dus shes 'di dag ni//thugs chud gsung ba zla ba lhung nger bzhugs//sems can mkhas pa 'jig
148a4(mdo sde): rten dam pa ste//sum cu gnyis mtshan ldan pa gzugs mchog mnga'//drang srong chen po 'jig rten mi sdug pa//tshangs pa yi chad dngos kyis nyer mchis
148a5(mdo sde): na//me gsum lhung ba'i 'jig rten gzigs su gsol//khyod kyis byang chub yan lhag grus bstan gsol//mgon po byang chub yan lag bdun ston pa//khyod
148a6(mdo sde): kyis bdud rtsi'i char dbab dus 'di lags//'du shes log po long ba rab nyams pa'i//skye dgu bdud lam gnas pa gzigs su gsol//ston khyod mig
148a7(mdo sde): ldan gzhan du mi 'gyur ba//khyod kyi dus 'dir thugs rje bskyed du gsol//mu stegs don 'gro ga yang sa chen po yi//srid pa'i rgya mtshos skye dgu 'di
148b1(mdo sde): ra rnams//sems can snod mtshalas 'don 'gro 'don//myadzad pas byang chub yan lag gas kyang brtul//'jog rgyag sa smras bcings skye dgra 'di dag m+b+ha/
148b2(mdo sde): sto bas gnod byas sring pa'i khol po dag/yun+da ring bgags pa bcings las thar ma mchis//sems can khA stAR+Sha n+ti s+yA grol myi mdzad//nyan mings dbang gis
148b3(mdo sde): ldog par rab sod le//yun ring gnyid log sgrub pas khebs pa rnams//tshul khrims brtul zhugs brtan pa'i ting 'dzin 'thob//chos kyi rnga sna ci srung bsgrags
148b4(mdo sde): mi bgyid//'jig rten dag nA dbul gyur 'gro ba rnams//'gro lngar thag chad pa slong zhugs la//khyod kyis nor bdun de ring brnyes gyur pas//mchod sbyin dam
148b5(mdo sde): bA ci skad da mi sprul//bdud rtsi ming pa'i sems can stong po rnams//dad pa phal chen sa bon 'dzin mchis na//rnam grol glog dang thugs rje'i char smin las//
148b6(mdo sde): ci snang byang chub yan lhag tshor mi dbab//zug rngu s+yai zug dri'i nad pa khams gsum na//nyon mongs nyam thag nad snying zas phongs lnga//byang chub yin lag
148b7(mdo sde): sman mchog brnyes pa yis//nad pa yun ring dang ci grol mi mdzad//mun pa mun na gzhugs pa'i 'gro ba rnams//gti mug bsgribs po mya ngan chen po
149a1(mdo sde): nang //skyong chen shes rab mar mes mun chen po//bzod brlag ci yi slad du sel mi mdzad//'dam rdza chu bo bzhin yongs skyo ba'i//skye bo
149a2(mdo sde): g.yang sa chen por lhung 'di dag/lhar bcas 'jig rten sman skud thugs rtse ba'i//mgon pos dra ni ci slad gdon mi bgyi//lta la chag sngo pa'i mu stegs phawa//
149a3(mdo sde): chen gyis//lha mi kun tu glongs par mchis rnams la//drang po ma yo gla yo med bde ba yis//ci slad rin chen lam dag da mi bstan//mi dbang seng ge la ni
149a4(mdo sde): tshangs gsol bas//rdzogs sangs rgyas spyan 'jig rten gsum la gzigs//gzigs nas sems can rnams la brtse bskyed do//nad med chos kyi 'khor
149a5(mdo sde): lo bskor bar gsol//lha de dag gis de ltar bsngags nas kyang //byang chub snying por seng gdan nga 'dug la//bstod de bstod nas de ltar dga' bas dong //
149a6(mdo sde): ngas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos/bcom ldan 'das la 'di
149a7(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor 'dus pa 'di'i nang na ni gang dag ting nge 'dzin 'di dang /pha
149b1(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa 'di dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgro la 'jug pa brgyad khri bzhi stong po 'di rnams thob pa dag mchis lags sbrum/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan
149b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po lnga 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
149b3(mdo sde): po'i 'khor 'dus pa 'di'i nang na gang dgra bskal pa bzang po 'di la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin gshegs
149b4(mdo sde): pa bzhi po dag ma gtogs par gang dgra ting nge 'dzin 'di dang /pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa 'di dag dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la 'jug pa brgyad khri bzhi sdong po 'di dag
149b5(mdo sde): thob pa gang dag bskul pa bzang po 'di la byang chub mngon par rdzogs paro 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag yod do//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
149b6(mdo sde): mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//legs so legs so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang //
149b7(mdo sde): skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /lha dang /mi rnams kyi don dang /sman pa dang /bde ba dang /dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang /
150a1(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang /ma 'ongs pa na byang chub sems dpa' rnams la snang ba bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /bla na med pa
150a2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa na sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ba'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi rigs dang /ming de dag bka' stsal du gsol//
150a3(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal
150a4(mdo sde): po de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin yid la zung zhig dang bshad do//byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das de lta
150a5(mdo sde): lags so zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
150a6(mdo sde): gi mtshan dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ming tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa////'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//
150a7(mdo sde): bam po dgu pa//'khor ba 'jig dang gser thub dang //'od srung shAkya'i skyes mchog dang //byams pa seng ge rab gsal dang //thub pa me tog ces bya dang //me tog
150b1(mdo sde): rgyu skar bzang ded dpon//lag chen dang ni stobs chen+da dang //rgyu skar rgyal po ci spyan dang //snyan pa tog dang 'od chen dang //grol ba'i phung po zhes bya ba'i//sangs
150b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyis ni sde rgyun rdzogs//rnam par snang mdzad nyi ma'i snying //zla ba 'od 'phro 'od bzang dang //mya ngan med dang skar rgyal dang //rab gsal phreng thogs yon tan
150b3(mdo sde): 'od//don gzigs dang ni mar me dang //mthu ldan sman pa des pa dag/mdzod spu brtan ldan lha yi dpal//gdul dka' yon tan rgyal mtshan dang //sgra gcan
150b4(mdo sde): tshogs can tshangs pa'i dbyangs//tshigs brtan dang ni mi 'gying dang //'od mdzad lhun po chen po dang //rdo rje sdom dang mi bsnyengs dang //rin chen pad spyan stobs sde
150b5(mdo sde): dang //me tog 'od zer ye shes dgyes//gzi chen tshangs pa 'od dpag med//klu sbyin dang ni brtan gshegs dang //don yod mthong dang brtson 'grus sbyin//bzang
150b6(mdo sde): skyong dga' bo 'chi med dang //seng ge'i rgyal mtshan rgyal ba chos//mchog dga' rgyal po kha lo sgyur//dgyes gshegs chu lha yon tan lag/spos kyi glang po rnam
150b7(mdo sde): por gzigs//'brug sgra dang ni lags sems dang //yid bzang dri med zla ba dang //grags tshon gtsug na nor bu dang //drag shul seng ge'i stobs ljon pa//
151a1(mdo sde): rnam par rgyal chen shes rab brtsegs//legs gnas blo gros yan lag skyes//blo mtha' yas dang gzugs bzang dang //mkhyen ldan
151a2(mdo sde): 'od zer brtul zhugs brtan//bkra shis dang ni bden pa'i tog/pad+ma dang ni sred med bu//lhag bzang ye shes 'byung gnas dang //yon tan 'od ni
151a3(mdo sde): 'phro ba yin//tshangs byin rin chen 'byung gnas lha yi me tog dang //don legs sems dang chos kyi dbang phyug blo gros pa//spobs pa dag ni brtsegs pa
151a4(mdo sde): rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang //bcu pa stobs bcur ldan par phan par bzhed pa yin//rnam par rol par ldan dang mun dang bral ba sgra gcan lha//ri bo'i rgyal
151a5(mdo sde): mtshan tshogs can 'od dang de bzhin rin chen snying //shin tu mthor gshegs dang ni rgyal ba skar rgyal ru rings dang //bcu pa khams gsum mgon po yon
151a6(mdo sde): tan glags zhes bya ba yin+da//nyi zla nyi ma'i 'od dang skar mkhan seng ge'i tog dang ni//dus mkhyen rgyal po dpal gyi snying po srid mtha' gzigs pa dang //
151a7(mdo sde): glog gi 'od dang gser gyi ri bo seng ges byin pa dang //bcu pa mi dbang rgyal ba gzhan gyis mi thubo rgyal mtshan yin//mchog dga' grags pa brtson
151b1(mdo sde): 'grus brtan pa dang ni grags rdzogs dang //bsnyengs bral dang ni mchod 'os lha dang sgron ma chen po dang //'jig rten 'od dang spros dri zhim dang yon tan mchog 'dzin dang //
151b2(mdo sde): bcu pa rang byung mtshungs med mun dang rnam par bral ba yin//seng ge'i 'gram pa dang ni rin chen grags dang skyon rab zhi//bdud rtsi 'chang dang mi yi zla ba dang ni shin tu gzigs//
151b3(mdo sde): rab tu brgyan dang nor bu 'od dang ri bo brtsegs pa'i tog/bcu pa chos kyi 'byung gnas don nges ldan pa yin//tshoms sbyin dang ni rin chen 'byung gnas skye dbang mtshungs//bstabs
151b4(mdo sde): kyis gshegs pa dang ni blo gnas pa dang gdugs mdzes dang //gtso bo drang ni shin tu 'phags pa dpal dang seng ge'i sgra//bcu pa skyes bu gtso bo rnam par rol
151b5(mdo sde): ldan yin//klu yi 'od dang me tog ri bo dang ni klu dga' dang //spos kyi dbang phyug shin tu grags dang stobs lha zhes bya dang //yon tan phreng bar ldan dang klu yi
151b6(mdo sde): ldeg dang mig brgyan dang //bcu pa drang srong chen po legs par sbyangs pa'i blo zhes bya//zil non ye shes mtha' yas spyan dang bden par gsung ba dang //nyi
151b7(mdo sde): pa'i 'od dang nges pa'i blo dang mtha' yas pa yi gzugs//rnam par snang mdzad rin chen tog dang the tshom spangs pa dang //bcu pa rang nyid byung ba 'jig rten dag las 'das pa yin///
152a1(mdo sde): dodron yod rnam par gnon dang rtogs mdzad me tog rgyal mtshan dang //ri dbang rgyal po dang ni glazi brjid che dang don mdzad gzigs//brags pa
152a2(mdo sde): mtha' yas dang ni rin chen lha dang don gnas mkhyen//bcu pa blo ni yongs su rdzogs pa dman min grags pa yin//mya ngan med ces bya dang dri ma bral dang tshangs
152a3(mdo sde): lha dang //sa yi dbang phyug me tog spyan dang rnam par 'byes pa'i sku//chos kyi 'od dang kun ni gzugs drang yon tan 'od gsal dang //bcu pa 'jig rten
152a4(mdo sde): gsum gyis mchod pa dri med zla ba'i zhal//rin chen 'od dang rin chen tog dang ni//grags bla 'od byed gzi brjid dpag med dang //dus mkhyen seng ge'i sku dang
152a5(mdo sde): mkhas blo dang //rgyal ba dga' dang yon tan phung po dang //zla ba'i tog dang mthu ni thob pa dang //mthu rtsal mtha' yas zla ba dri med dang //don rnams thams
152a6(mdo sde): cad gzigs dang dpa' bo dang //'byor par ldan dang bsod nams sgron ma dang //yon tan 'od 'phro blo ni yangs pa dang //legs skyes nor lha yid gnyis
152a7(mdo sde): spong ba dang //'dzin pa dpag med mchog sred tshems med dang //mi gnas pa dang sangs rgyas der gnas dang //tshogs can gtso bo 'gro ba'i 'od zer dang //
152b1(mdo sde): phal chen rgyal dang gzi brjid mtha' yas dang //don gyi blo glos sman pa'i rgyal po dang //tha ba spangs dang rims med legs byin dang //glags byin me tog byin dang
152b2(mdo sde): skyes bus byin//rdo rje sde dang phal chen byin pa dang //zhi ba'i blo gros spos kyi glang po dang //sred med bu dang nges pa mi tshugs po//nyi zla glig gi tog dang mchod pa dang //
152b3(mdo sde): dpal sbaso dang ni ye shes nyi ma dang //don grub lhun po brtsegs dang dgra 'dul dang //pad+ma dang ni dgra bcom grags pa yin//ye shes 'gros dang nyon mongs bral
152b4(mdo sde): ba drang //'dam bu dang ni spos bzang yul 'khor rangs//lha grags srid mtha' gzigs dang zla ba dang //sgra gcan dang ni rin chen zla ba dang //seng ge'i rgyal mtshan
152b5(mdo sde): dang ni bsam gtan dgyes//rdzogs ldan rnam rol yon tan rin chen dang //dgra bcom grags pa pad dngos mdzod spu ldan//spobs pa grags pa rdo rje nor bu dang //tshe
152b6(mdo sde): dradapag med dang nor bu bkod pa dang //dbang chen yon tan 'byung gnas lhun po grags//'od zer bcu pa ma smad glang po'i 'gros//yid du 'thad pa rIn chen zla ba dang //
152b7(mdo sde): zhi ba rab gsal rgyal po kha lo sgyur//dga' ba'i dbang phyug gtsug ni rin po che//bsnyengs bral rin cheni snying po zla ba'i zhal//dri ma med grags zhi ba'i gzi brjid dang /
153a1(mdo sde): dga' tog/skyugacan lha dang na spyod bzung //lha drug dag/ dang rin chen phung po dang // dzes par gshegs pa skyeng ge'i rtogs pa dang //shrInaH
153a2(mdo sde): mthor gshegs skye dbang blo gros bzang //'jig rten 'od dang rin chen gzi brjid dang //skal ldan shing rta kun rgyal dga' ba bkod//stegs mdzad dang ni spos
153a3(mdo sde): glang blo 'od 'phro//ri bo'i rgyal mtshan dang ni spos bzang dang //chos brtan drung ni gzi brjid drag shul can//chos kyi nor bu bzang byin bde gshegs zla//tshangs
153a4(mdo sde): pa'i dbyangs dang seng ge'i zla ba dpal//legs par skyes dang thub pa med pa'i tshogs//grogs pa'i bshes gnyen bden pa zhes bya dang //dka' thub chen po
153a5(mdo sde): lhun po'i 'od zer dang //yon tan brtsegs pa mchod grags chos grags dang //sbyin 'od glog 'byin bden par gsung ba dang //'tsho byed na tshod bzang po legs
153a6(mdo sde): tshogs can//rnam nges blo gros srid mtha' nor bu'i spos//rgyal bas dgyes dang srong ge'i 'od zer dang //rnam par snang mjed grags mchog thugs rab gzhungs//
153a7(mdo sde): nor bu zla ba drag shul 'od zer dang //brtul zhugs thub med 'gros mchod nor bu'i tshogs//'jig rten bla ma glang chen seng ge dang //zla ba rin chen 'od zer
153b1(mdo sde): sgra gcan sbed//yon tan rgya mtsho 'od zer ldan pa dang //rab tu zhi stabs 'jig rten bzang po dang //mya ngan med pa shugs bcu stongs dgyes dang //mthu yi
153b2(mdo sde): dpal dang mthu thob mthu chen dang //yon tan snying po bden par spyod pa dang //dge mchog rgyal po skar rgyal 'od zer che//glog gi 'od dang yon tan rgya chen dang /
153b3(mdo sde): rin po che dang dpal 'od bdud 'dul dang //go bgos seng ge'i phyag dang me tog bzang //rin chen mthon po dang ni rgya mtsho dang //sa 'dzin don blo mnga' nga yon tan bsags///
153b4(mdo sde): yon tan tshogs dang rin po che yi me//'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten zla ba dang //dbyangs snyan tshangs pa'i tog dang tshogs can gtso//seng gA'i stabs dang drag shul
153b5(mdo sde): byin pa dang //chos kyi dbang phyug gzi 'od 'od zer che//rin chen grags pa tshogs can gsal ba dang //grags pa mtha' yas 'od zer don yod dang //lha yi drang
153b6(mdo sde): srong skye dbang dge 'dun brtan//phyogs bzang tog dang yul 'khor me tog dang //chos kyi blo gros rlung gi shugs ltar gshegs//legs bsdams grags pa snang
153b7(mdo sde): ljin lho tshogs dang //yon tan bsrungs don blo gros bsnyengs pa med//grogs brtan dang ni 'od gnas mtshungs pa dang //nor zhabs thar pa'i gzi brjid ngos
154a1(mdo sde): bzang dang //blo bzang dang ni kun tu gzi brjid dang //ye shes mchog ma dang ni tshangs pa gnas//bden pa gsung drang blo bzang stobs byin dang //
154a2(mdo sde): seng stabs me tog tog dang shes 'byung gnas//me tog byin dang yon tan snying po dang //rin chen grags pa rmad du byung ba dang //mi tshugs bsgyings med nyi
154a3(mdo sde): ma'i 'od dag dang //tshangs gshegs lha yi mthu rtsal ye shes dgyes//lha bden nor bu'i snying po yon tan gragaso//ye shes dpal dang bcings pa med pa
154a4(mdo sde): dang //brtul shugs brtan dang lha yi gzi brjid dang //tshangs thub dral bzhud brtul zhugs dka' thub dang //'od zer phung po dang ni gzi brjid che//tsam+ba ka
154a5(mdo sde): dang dga' mdzad tshogs can bzang //dbang po rgyal mtshan bcu pa dgyes chen yin//sna ma'i me tog 'od dang tshogs can 'od//skrun mdzad madrangs 'gro don
154a6(mdo sde): legs nges pa dang //khyu mchog dang ni lag bzang 'od zer che//bsam pa'i byin pa dang ni bsod nams 'od//rin chen dbyangs dang rdo rje'i sde dang ni//'byor
154a7(mdo sde): ldan seng ge'i stobs dang dri med spyan//'od srung dang ni blo gsal ye shes 'gros//gzi brjid drag shul 'od zer chen po dang //nyi ma'i 'od dang dri ma mod
154b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'od//gzi brjid rnam 'byes khengs med sbrang rtsi'i zhal//zla 'od glog sbyin rab zhir gshegs pa dang //mi 'khrugs pa dang dgra bcom grags pa dang //chos kyi yon
154b2(mdo sde): tan zhing bzang bkod rgyal po//mngon par 'phags dang sbyin sreg 'od 'phro dang //pad dpal rin chen bkod dang shin tu bzang //rin chen mchog dang thugs ni shin tu
154b3(mdo sde): gzhungs//sangs rgyas 'od dpag med dang rgya mtshos byin//tshangs pa'i tog dang zla gdugs 'od 'phro dang //dri med rgyal po ye shes grags pa kun rgyal yon tan 'od///
154b4(mdo sde): sgra grags zla rgyas pad+ma'i 'od zer brtul zhugs bzang po dang //sgron rgyal glog gi tog dang 'od zer rgyal po skar mkhan dang //grags pa rdzogs ldan pad+ma'i snying po rgyal
154b5(mdo sde): dang spyan mdzes dang //rnyog ma med don drag shul sde dang bsod nams gzi mthu rtsal//thogs med blo dang sgra gcan lha dang shes phung kha lo sgyu re//skye dbang mtshungs
154b6(mdo sde): dradang me tog tog dang sgra gcan 'dzin sman che//rgyu skar rgyal po sman rgyal bsod nams glang po gcod mdzad dang //rnam grags rgyal po nyi 'od chos mdzod blo gros bzung //
154b7(mdo sde): yon tan dbang mtshungs rdo rje sde dang shes rab brtsigs pa dang //legs gnas blo sbyangs tshangs dbyangs yon tan mchog dang 'brug sgra dbyangs//mngon shes tog
155a1(mdo sde): dang tog 'od dge ba tshangs pa skyes mchog dang //spyan sdug pa dang klus byin bden pa'i tog dang brgyan pa dang //zhum pa med dbyangs rin chen 'od
155a2(mdo sde): dang tshangs byin seng ge dang //'od zer sna tshogs ye shes dpa' bo byed phung me tog rgyas//mthu rtsal stobs dang bsod nams phung po gzugs mchog skur mkhan
155a3(mdo sde): dang //zlo sgron gzi brjid phung po byang chub rgyal po mi zad pa//mngon rtogs spyan dang yan lag rgyas dang yul 'khor shes rab mchog/gzi brjid tshim mdzad
155a4(mdo sde): shes rab byin dang mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs//chags pa med mdzod gtso bo sau byin dang gtso bo shes mthu rtsal//'od 'phro dbang po shugs 'chang skar rgyal 'od
155a5(mdo sde): bzang grags pa byin//gzugs bzang rgyal po don grub seng ge'i sde dang nor lha'i bu//grags rgyal rgya chen snying po bsod nams 'od zer sbrang 'dron pa//sgron rgyal
155a6(mdo sde): ye shes brtseg sngo dang lha mchog dang ni sa bdag dang //grol brnyes gtsug gi gser dang sgro gcan bzang po thub par dka'//thub gsal zla ba'i 'od zer gser gyi
155a7(mdo sde): 'od dang legs byin lha'i//yon tan dbang po chos gdugs bsod nams lag dang chags med dang //ye shes gya nom blo zhib gzi byin thams cad pa rtsi sman//
155b1(mdo sde): rnam grol tog drang 'od mdzad ye shes rgyal po 'jigs mdzad dang //chu bo spong dang thogs med grags pa bden phung dbyangs snyan dang //rI dbang mtshungs dang chos brtsegs
155b2(mdo sde): thar pa'i gzi byin legs mdzad dang //rab zhi'i sku dang yid 'ong gsung blo sbyangs dang chu lha dang //'gros mchod seng gri'i legs dang chos kyi mthu rtsal skal bzang po//mi
155b3(mdo sde): 'khrugs mdog dang gzi brjid rgyal po rtogs mdzad spyan legs dang //don gnas blo dang snang ba'i 'od zer spros gzi kun dga' mdzad//don yod gshegs drang khro
155b4(mdo sde): ba bcom dang gzugs mchog logs gshegs dang //rab sbyin grags dang 'od gtsang lha yi nyi ma shes rab byin//mnyam bzhag bdag nyid gzi mdangs rgyal rigs
155b5(mdo sde): skal ldan shing rta dang //gser mchog rnam grol gtsug dang chos ldan dang ni spos gnas dang //dregs spangs ye shes mdzod dang tshangs par gshegs dang tsin+dan dang //
155b6(mdo sde): mya ngan med dang seng ge'i 'od zer yul 'khor tog pad snying //gzi brjid mtha' yas lha 'od shes rab me tog mkhas pa dang //ye shes 'byor ldan tshangs dribyig phyag
155b7(mdo sde): no rin chen dbang ldan dang //rdzogs par gsung dang mchog gsung mchod 'os skar rgyal nyi ma dang //'dam brgal ye shes brnyes dang grub pa rmi bya chos sbyin dang //
156a1(mdo sde): phan bzhed ye shes ldan pa grags 'od zer 'dra rnam bcom dang //bai DUr+ya snying me tog lha rgyal zla ba dran 'od dang //dge ba'i 'od dang yon tan
156a2(mdo sde): mchog ma kun gyi 'od//rin po che yi dpal dang skyes bu zla ba dang //sgra gcan bdud rtsi'i 'od dang 'jig rten dag gi mchog/skar 'od zhi stabs bcu pa ye shes
156a3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho yin//ri dbang rabazhi yon tan mtha' stobs lha dbang dang //dbyangs snyun ngos bzang dang ni don la gnas pa dang //yon tan gzi brjid dpal dang mkhyen
156a4(mdo sde): ldan zla med dang //bcu pa nga ro dpag med rgyal ba zhes kyang bya//'od bzong shin tu thugs gzhungs don dgongs gti mug bral//dbyangs kyi yan lag khyad
156a5(mdo sde): 'phags mchog tu mdzes par gshegs//zhi ba'i don dang skyon med blo dbyangs dge ba dang //pad+ma'i mdzod dang bcu pa 'od zer bzang po yin//spobs po'i
156a6(mdo sde): mdog dang stegs bzang po dang tshogs dbang dang //bsnyengs po dang ni bral ba ye shes bzhed pa dang //bde gshegs spobs pa'i spyan dang blo yi mchog ma dang //zla
156a7(mdo sde): ba rin chen zla 'od dang ni bcu pa bsnyengs med yin//gzigs pa che dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang dbyangs bzang dang //shes rab chen po'i stegs dang blo gros zla med
156b1(mdo sde): dang //rdo rje mkhregs dang byang chub blo gros ljon shing dbang //gdangs snyan pa dang bcu pa bsod nams stobs kyang yin//mthu yi dpal dang 'phags pa dgyes drang
156b2(mdo sde): mthu stobs dang //skar ma lo ni dgyes dang sprin gyi rnga sgra dang //spyan sdug zhal dang ye shes bzang ldan 'byor ldan dang //yon tan phung po dang ni bcu pa gsal ba yin//
156b3(mdo sde): chos kyi rgyal mtshan ye shes nga ro nam mkha' dang //mchod sbyin nga ri shrIs rab rnam 'god nga ro dang //yon tan 'od zer gzi brjid drang srong dbyung po dang //blo ldan
156b4(mdo sde): spobs pa'i tshogs dang bcu pa mchod sbyin bzang //zla ba'i zhal dang shin tu gzigs dang rdul bral dang //yon tan tshogs dang tog ldan bsod nams rgyal mtshan
156b5(mdo sde): dang //yul 'khor spobs pa dang ni rin chen rab sbyin dang //zla ba dgyes pa dang ni bcu pa seng ge'i stobs//dbang bsgyur rgyal po dang ni bdud rtsi gsal ba dang //bsam
156b6(mdo sde): gtan snyoms dang 'khrug med dri ma rab zhi dang //phyogs ma bslad dang mdzes pa dang ni zhal bzang dang //shugs gnas ye shes ldan dang bcu pa gsung dbang yin//
156b7(mdo sde): gzi brjid chen po blo gros zab mo bdud rtsi dang //chos kyi stobs dang mchod par ldan dang me tog 'od//khams gsum dag gi mchod gnas sgra gcan nyi ma'i snying /
157a1(mdo sde): lha yis mchod pa bcu pa thar pa'i rgyal mtshan yin//dge ba'i gtsug dang bdud rtsi 'od dang rdo rje dang //brtan pa dang ni rin chen phung po mdzes
157a2(mdo sde): gshegs dang //nyi ma lta bur gshegs pa dang ni dag pa'i 'od//yon tan gtsug dang bcu pa dpal ni rdzogs pa dang //seng ge'i stabs dang gyen du 'phags
157a3(mdo sde): pA me tog byin//'od 'gyed pa dang pad+ma dang ni ye shes dgyes//bkod pa mdzes dang gti mug med par gnas pa dang //rma med pa dang bcu pa tog gi rgyal mtshan
157a4(mdo sde): yin//bde bar dgongs dang gti mug med rgyal cho ga mkhyen//dag pa'i rgya mtsho dang nI rin chen mnga' dang mi dma' ba//skye bo dga' mdzad rma bya'i nga ro ma zhum
157a5(mdo sde): dang //bcu pa srid pa'i sred pa dri ma spangs pa yin//spyod pa'i stegs dang lha mang dag gis snyan bsgrags pa//rin po che yi stabs dang phyag na pad bsnams dpal///
157a6(mdo sde): dgra las rgyal dang 'byor ldan grags pa yul 'khor bzang //me tog 'od dang bcu pa seng ge'i nga ro yin//zla ltar shar dang 'joms pa'i mchog dang mi g.yo dang //
157a7(mdo sde): phan ldan gshegs dang bsod nams sgron ma'i rgyal po dang //dbyangs kyis bskul dang gau ta mi mdang stobs dang //blo gnas rang bzhin dang ni bcu pa zla ba bzang ///
157b1(mdo sde): byang chub yan lag me tog bkra shris legs ston dang //ye shes gzi brjid stobs dang dge ba'i sgron ma dang //mthu rtsal brtan po lha yi sgra dang rab zhi dang //nyi ma zhal dang /
157b2(mdo sde): bcu pa thar pa'i brtul zhugs yin//tshul khrims 'od dang brtul zhugs gnas pa rdul med dang //snying po 'phags dang mig sman 'phel bar mdzad pa dang //spos 'od
157b3(mdo sde): dus mkhyen 'od dang dran pa'i dbang po dang //thogs med rgyal mtshan bcu pa byang chub mchog bgrod yin//spyod gsal rin chen dgyes dang chos dbang phyug/lha 'od
157b4(mdo sde): thams cad bshes gnyen chen po dang //bshes gnyen bzang po rab tu zhi ba'i stabs//bdud rtsi bdag po bcu pa lhun po'i 'od//'phags pas bstod dang snang
157b5(mdo sde): ldan gzi brjid 'bar//snang ba gzigs dang legs spyan rnam smin dang //legs dgyes mya ngan bral dang rin chen 'od//spyod par ldan dang bcu pa bsod nams
157b6(mdo sde): stobs//yon tan+da rgya mtsho rmad byung nga rgyal spong //bdud bArlag mdzad dang bag chags rgal stabs dang //mi phyed blo mnga' rgya mtsho dag mdzad dang //tshogs can grol
157b7(mdo sde): rgyal bcu pa dga' ba'i 'od//byang chub rgyal mtshan ye shes rin chen dang //shin tu bsil ba tshangs rgyal ye shes dgyes//rdzu 'phrul tog skye dbang mtshungs sa
158a1(mdo sde): dbang phyug/nyi ma dgyes dang bcu pa sgra gcan zla//me tog 'od dang sman bdag madrangs mnga' dang //bsod nams dgyes dang dga' stobs
158a2(mdo sde): dbyangs snyan dang //chos kyi dbang phyug tshangs dbyangs spyod bzung dang //bcu pa rgyal ba 'khrug pa med pa'i blo//dbyangs chen snyan par grags dang tog ldan dang //
158a3(mdo sde): gzi brjid rnam grags 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang //ljon pa gti mug rab zad dpag med dang //zla bzang bcu pa spobs pa mtha' yas tog/brtul zhugs btar
158a4(mdo sde): dang mchod gnas mya ngan brgal//dge dgyes 'gro ba'i blo gros dgyes par gshegs//zhabs mdzes ut+pal dul gnas me tog dang //bcu pa spobs pa mtha'
158a5(mdo sde): yas 'od zer yin//drang srong gsal ba yon tan brtson 'grus snying //lha bdag rin chen mtho gsal skal shing rta//bsod nams blo gros sbyin sreg 'od 'phro dang //
158a6(mdo sde): bcu pa yon tan mtha' yas gzi brjid phung po yini//seng ge'i stobs dang mi g.yo rab gsal dang //'od spyod glu dbyangs glu dbyangs 'dzin pa dang //dbyig
158a7(mdo sde): mchog 'jig rten dga' ba chos zla dang //bcu pa dga' ba mtha' yas grags zhes bya//sprin tog shes rab 'gros dang spos bzang dang //nam mkha'i dbyings
158b1(mdo sde): dang lha dang lha rgyal dang //nor thugs pa dang nor bzang skyon ma dang //badra rin tshun par 'o dngas nas bya//skyo bang rgyal po ste gnan spyod pa dang //dbu mdu snang
158b2(mdo sde): blorin chen grags pa dang //don mdzad mdzad mtha' gzigs dang sgyid me tog/mdzod bu bcu po spobs pa mtshungs med rgyal//ye shes rnam 'byed nga ro seng mcheg//
158b3(mdo sde): mdzes gshegs bsod nams sbyin ma bkra shis ldan//yul 'khor mya ngan med blo sems blo ldan//chos sgron spyan dang bcu pa shin tu gzigs//shugs 'dor
158b4(mdo sde): stobs chen shes rab me tog dang //brtan pa'i dbyings dang bde ldan don gsung dang //dgyes pa gsal ba seng ge'i zhal gtsug phung //bcu pa seng ge zhes bya smang
158b5(mdo sde): mdzad 'gyur//bskal bzang 'di la sangs rgyas gang de dag/de dag gi ni mtshan rnams bsgrags pa rnams//'bras bu mya ngan 'das zhes bya ba gang //nyan pa de dag
158b6(mdo sde): 'di la rmongs mi 'gyur//mkhas pa bag yod ldan pasnga gus bgyis te//rgyal ba 'di dag dri ni mtshan rnams nyon//de dag gi ni mtshan rnams legs thos nas//
158b7(mdo sde): ngan song sdug bsngal phyir zhing myongs mi 'gyur//tshul khrims gnas pa sdom pa'i rjes mthun zhing //thos la mos pas rtogs dang ldan pa rnams//zab mo'i bzod
159a1(mdo sde): pa yongs su rdzogs byas nas//'jig rten mgon kun de dag gis ni mthong //gang zhig mi shes bskal pa bye bar ni//sdig pa'i las byas
159a2(mdo sde): las 'bras rnam smin kun//des ni zad byas rgyal ba de dag gi/mtshan rnams bzung nas kyang ni rgyal bar 'gyur//mdo sde khri phrog du mar 'jug pa dang //ting 'dzin
159a3(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul so so yang dag rig/sgra skad du mi rtogs dang ye shes dag/ting nge 'dzin 'di lasra ni btsal bar bya//'tsho ba dge ba g.yo ni med pa dang //rnam smin
