448b7(mdo sde): mchog ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa lon grangs mtha' yas kun la yang //brtan rnams byang chub dag la gzhol ba'o//bye bo phrag ni dpag tu med po yod//mi
449a1(mdo sde): tshe lo grangs ther 'bum phrag gsum yin//byang chub tu ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir//dam chos lo grangs ther 'bum phrag gsum gnas//grags
449a2(mdo sde): pa mtha' yas mya ngan 'das nas kyang //rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur//'jig rten mgron po lha yi skye ba yi//yul ni ngang tshul kun tu bsdus zhes bya//
449a3(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad//stong khams gnyis tsam yAb ni sgron ma yin//spobs pa'i blo gros zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum//sras po lha gsal 'byor byed rim
449a4(mdo sde): gro pa//mig legs pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste//shin tu sbyangs pa'i lus ni rdzu 'phrul can+da//'dus pa lan grangs drug cu bzhi kun la'ang //sems can mchog la byang
449a5(mdo sde): chub 'dod pa po//bye ba phrag ni khri phrag dgu dgu yod//mi tshe lo grangs dag ni 'bum yang yin//yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag/lo grangs stong phrag brgyad
449a6(mdo sde): khri'i bar du gnas//mig sbyin mdzad pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang //rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi rgyal po yi//skye ba'i
449a7(mdo sde): yul ni lha yis mchod ces bya//rgyal po'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad//steng khams gcig tsam yab ni lha bzang yin//lha yi dbang phyug ma ni rgyal ba'o yum//
449b1(mdo sde): skyes po lha yin lha ni rim gro pa//tshangs pa 'phags zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste//lha dbang gca bo zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang //gzungs
449b2(mdo sde): thob byang chub dag ni 'dod pa po//khri phyag dag ni dgu bcu bzhi bzhi yod//mi tshe lo grangs bye stong dgu bcu dgu//byang chub tu ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir//dam chos lo grangs
449b3(mdo sde): brgyad 'bum bar du gnas//rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la//mchod rten bzang pos zhing rnams gang bar 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu gsal ba yi//skye
449b4(mdo sde): ba'i yul ni rin chen gsal zhes bya//rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad//dpag tshad khri yod yab ni gsal ba yin//rin chen mchog ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//sras
449b5(mdo sde): po legs ldan legs mthong rim gro pa//mig sdug pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste//rtag par mthong zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa len grangs drug cu gnyis kun la'ang //dag
449b6(mdo sde): bcom zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan pa//bye ba phrag ni bdun cu gsum gsum yod//mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong yin//'gog par phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang //
449b7(mdo sde): lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong bar du gnas//sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad brgya pa gcig/gser dang nor bu'i lnga lngas mdzes par byas//de bzhin gshegs pa nor bzang skye
450a1(mdo sde): ba yi//yul ni bsod nams rnam par brgyan zhes bya//rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi ched//dpag tshad dgu stong rab tu dge ba yab//thar
450a2(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum//sras po ston brtsegs rgyal ba rim gro pa//ye shes nga ro zhes bya mkhas pa ste//mdzes par gnas zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul
450a3(mdo sde): can//'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang //ngar mi 'dzin pa yang srid zad pa po//bye ba phrag ni sumau cu gnyis gnyis yod//mi tshe lo grangs sumo khri drug stong
450a4(mdo sde): yin//nus par phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang //lo grangs sum khri bzhi stong bar du gnas//rgyal ba de yi sku gdung rgyas 'gyur te//zhing rnams dag tu rnam
450a5(mdo sde): par gang bar 'gyur////'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po nyi shu gsum pa//mtshungs pa med pa
450a6(mdo sde): sgron ma skye ba yi//yul ni bsod nams sgron ma zhes kyang bya//rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad//dpagra tshad sum stong rnam par gnon pa yab//gzi brjid
450a7(mdo sde): 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//sras po gze byin sbyin ma rim gro pa//sgron ma byed ces bya ba mkhas pa ste//'jig rten snang bar byed pa rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa la ni
450b1(mdo sde): grangs bdun cu kun la yang //dgra bcom de dag tshogs par 'gyur ba'i grangs//bdun 'bum bdun 'bum dag ni 'dus par 'gyur//mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri chig stong yin///
450b2(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag/lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur//'jig rten phan phyir sku gdung rgyas 'gyur la//rin chen brgya yi dri bas rnam par
450b3(mdo sde): spras//rgyal ba rin chen nga ro dbyangs dag gi/skye ba'i yul ni dbyangs dang ldan zhes bya//rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshod//dpag tshad brgya stong yab ni lha lus
450b4(mdo sde): yin//rin chen 'gros zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//sras po rgyal byin rgal gyur rim gro pa//nga rgyal bcad ces bya ba mkhas pa ste//nyon mongs bsal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul/
450b5(mdo sde): can//'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang //tshul bzhin chos kyi pha rol phyin pa po//bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu gnyis gnyis yod//mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri'i'o bar
450b6(mdo sde): du gnas//mya ngan 'das nas dam pa'i chos dag kyang //lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur//sku gdung mchod rten dpag ched brgyad pa gcig/rin chen
450b7(mdo sde): bya ba dag gis rab tu brgyan//rgyal ba skye dbang rgyal po skye ba yi//yul ni dreg shul snang bar byed ces bya//rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi ched//dpag ched brgya
451a1(mdo sde): yod yab ni khyad par 'phags//rgya mtsho'i blo gros zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum//sras po rgya mtsho mtsho chen rim gro pa//bdud rtsi dga' zhes bya ba mkhas
451a2(mdo sde): pa ste//mya ngan 'das pa'i stegos bzang rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa lan grangs drug cu gnyis kun la'ang //dngos med phyin pa gti mug med zhi ba//bye ba phrag ni drug cu
451a3(mdo sde): gsum gsum yod//mi tshe lo grangs drug khri chig stong yin//dri ma spangs pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang //lo grangs drug khri chig stong bar du gnas//rgyal ba'i sku gdung
451a4(mdo sde): dag ni rgyas 'gyur la//mchod rten bzang pos zhing rnams gang bar 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan sbed pa yi//skye ba'i yul ni sgron ma'i mdangs zhes bya//rgyal
451a5(mdo sde): bi'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad//dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni yon tan 'phrul//rdzu 'phrul 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yu mo//sras po 'phrul can bkod pa ro mgo pa//
451a6(mdo sde): blo dang ldan zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste//'khrul pa med par sems pa rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang //dgra bcom thams cad zag pa med pa po//
451a7(mdo sde): bye ba phrag ni nyi shu nyi shu yod//mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri chig stong yin//'gog par phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang //lo gangs nyi khri chig stong bar du gnas//rgyal ba'i
451b1(mdo sde): sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te//dpag tshad bdun pa rin po che yis sbas//'jig rten mgon po dge ba mdzad pa yi//skye yul gzi brjid 'jigs pa med ces bya//rigs
451b2(mdo sde): ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad//dpag tshad drug cu yab ni don bstan yin//mchog tu brtan zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//sras po kha sbyar dang po rim go pa//yon tan cha phra 'dzin
451b3(mdo sde): pa mkhas pa ste//sgron ma gnas zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu kun la yang //'jig rten dad pa dgra bcom chags med pa//bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu
451b4(mdo sde): dgu dgu yod//mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin//snang ba med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag/lo grangs dgu khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur//thugs rje chen po mya ngani 'das
451b5(mdo sde): nas kyang //rgyal ba'i sgra gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i blo gros kyi//skye ba'i yul ni mdangs snang byed ces bya//rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od
451b6(mdo sde): kyi tshad//dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni yid 'ong yin//lha dga' zhes ni bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//sras po ston byed mdzes can rim gra po//mchod par 'os zhes bya ba mkhas pa
451b7(mdo sde): ste//dad par byed ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa lan grangs sum cu kun la yang //lha yi gnas pa'i pha rol phyin pa po//bye ba phrag ni sum cu drug drug yod//mi tshe/
452a1(mdo sde): lo grangs nyi khri chig stong yin//dam chos lo grangs bye stong bar du gnas//rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad ni//bcu gcig pa gcig gser
452a2(mdo sde): gyi bla brer ldan//rin chen mchog ma bye bas rnam par spras//de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa yi//skye ba'i yul ni gser gyi sgron zhes bya//rigs ni rgyal rigs
452a3(mdo sde): yin te 'od kyi tshad//dpag tshad bcu gsum yab ni lha bzang yin//snyan par grags zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//sras po legs 'ongs blo ldani rim gro pa//yon tan
452a4(mdo sde): tshogs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste//gti mug med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa la ni grangs dgu bcu gcig kun la'ang //thams cad gnas pa med pa'i lam thob
452a5(mdo sde): pa//bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod//mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin//chags pa med par gyur pa'i dam ches dag/lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong bar du gnas//
452a6(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la//zhing rnams kun tu mchod rte ni bzang pos gang //sems can snying po don ni mdzad pa yi//skye ba'i yul ni lha yi bkod ces bya//
452a7(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad//dpag tshad lnga brgya yab ni spong ba yin//grags tog ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//sras po byang chub chos ldan rim gro pa/
452b1(mdo sde): yon tan gnas zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste//rnam grol gsal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang //dgra dag choms pa de dag 'dus pa'i grangs//
452b2(mdo sde): bye ba phrag ni 'bum 'bum 'dus par 'gyur//mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri chog stong yin//yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag/lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par
452b3(mdo sde): 'gyur//rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad ni//bcu gnyis pa gcig gser gyi bla brer ldan//de bzhin gshegs pa mdzad mtha' gzigs pa yi//skye ba'i yul ni
452b4(mdo sde): mdzes par sbyangs zhes bya//rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshang //dpag tshad drug cu rnam par dag pa yab//byas pa nges zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//sras po bzang
452b5(mdo sde): ldan grags byon rim gro pa//mchod rten dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste//gsal ba gti mug med pa rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa lan grongs brgyad cu kun la yang //dgra
452b6(mdo sde): dge tshoms po de dag kun gyi grangs//bye ba phrag ni brgya brgya 'dus par 'gyur//mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin//mya ngan 'das po dri yi dam chos dag/lo grangs bdun
452b7(mdo sde): khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur//rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la//stong gsum mchod rten bzang pos gang bar 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i me tog
453a1(mdo sde): /skye ba'i yul ni grags pa bsgrags zhes bya//rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad//sum cu rtsa lnga yab ni srid mtha' yin//tho gros nyi ma zhes
453a2(mdo sde): byargyal ba'i yum//nor lha'i bu sras zlanyi ri ma gro pa//dge bcom dog 'a zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste//'phag stsal dad par byed pa rdzu 'phrul rgyun//'dus pa lan grangs brgyad
453a3(mdo sde): cu kun la yang //da mod nam mkha' dag dang mtshungs pa po//bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu bzhi bzhi yod//mi che lo grangs brgyud khA nyaMs stong yin//yongs su mya ngan 'das
453a4(mdo sde): nis ma chos dag/lo glengs nyi khri tshig stong bar du gnas//sgo gdung mchod rten dpag tshad ban+d+ha gsum pa//gcig ste rin chen bkong pas rab tu brgyan//'drug rten
453a5(mdo sde): mgon po mdzod spu ldan pa yi//skye ba'i yul ni stegs mchog ces kyang bya//rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad//sum cu rtsa gsum yab ni rong gsal yin//
453a6(mdo sde): brtul zhugs grub ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//smras po zla stag rab dga' rimya glo pa//thar pa'i 'gros zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste//mya ngan med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul tan/
453a7(mdo sde): 'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu drug kun la'ang //r-i yi rgyal po lta bur mi g.yo ba//bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gsumo gsum yod//ma tshe le grangs nyi khri nyis stong yon//yongs
453b1(mdo sde): sa mya ngan 'das nas dam rgyas dag/lho grangs kyi khriny+tsis stong bar du gnas//rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la//mchod rten bye ba stong phyug brkyang bu byung //sangs rgya
453b2(mdo sde): slongs pa mtshungs med rgyal po yi//skye ba'i yul ni sna tshogs mdzes zhes bya//rigs ni rgyal rigs yon te 'od kyi ched//dpag tshod bcu ba na yab ni skyon ming yin//yon
453b3(mdo sde): tan mthong zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//yon tan ca ni sras blo ldan rim gro po//rgyal mtshan mchog ces bya ba mkhas pa ste//nor lha'i bu tog ces bya rdzu 'phrul can//'dus
453b4(mdo sde): popa lan grangs dgu bcu kun la yang //chu dang nam mkha' lta bur gsal ba po//bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu gnyis gnyis yod//mi tshe lo grangs dgu khwa nyis stong yin//yongs
453b5(mdo sde): su mya ngan 'das nis dam chos dag/lo grangs dgu khri chig stong bar du gnas//'gro lnga phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag/rgyas par 'gyur te zhing rnams gang bar 'gyur//
453b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ye shes rnam 'byed nga ro yi//skye ba'i yul ni rnam grags lha zhes bya//rigs ni bram ze yin te 'odadi dpag tshad //nyi shu rtsa gnyis yub ni ngos bzang yin//
453b7(mdo sde): mtshan ljon ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//bsod nams 'dod sras gtso bo rim gro pa//brtul zhugs grub ces bya ba mkhas pa ste//chags pa med par gnas pa rdzu
454a1(mdo sde): 'phrul can//'dus pa lan grangs sum cu gsum kun la'ang //dri bral 'jig rten dri ma'i dri med pa//bye ba phrag ni sum cu gnyis gnyis yod//mi
454a2(mdo sde): che lo grangs sum khri bzho stong yin//yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam tshes dag/lo grangs sum khri chog stong bar du gnas//rgyal po'i sku gdung mchod rten dpag
454a3(mdo sde): tshad ni//drug cu pa gcig gser gyi bla brer ldan//de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i mche ba yi//skye ba'i yul ni bro ba'i mchog ces bya//rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'ad
454a4(mdo sde): dpag tshang //bye ba phrag gsum glang chen dbang po yab//thar pa'i dbyangs ni rgyal yum lta byed sraso//na tshod bzang po zhes bya rim gro pa//yon tan tshogs zhes bya
454a5(mdo sde): ba mkhas pa ste//rnam par grol ba'i bkod pa rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa lan grangs drug cu kun la yang //spyod pa 'khrul pa med par gyur pa po//bye ba phrag ni drug cu
454a6(mdo sde): bdun bdun yod//mi tshe lo grangs drug khri bzhi stong yin//yongs su mya ngan 'das nis dem tshus dag/lo glengasu drug khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur//rgyal po
454a7(mdo sde): sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur te//zhing rnams mchod rten dag gis gang por 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes par gshegs pa yi//skye ba'i yul ni bden/
454b1(mdo sde): pa gsal zhes bya//rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad//dgu bcu rtsa bzhi yab ni bkod pa yin//gzi brjid chen po zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum//sras po nges pa
454b2(mdo sde): bzang po rim go pa//yid 'jam pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste//byang chub drang po zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa len grangs nyi shu lnga kun la'ang //legs dul yid
454b3(mdo sde): ldan glang po 'dre ba po//bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod//mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri bzhi stong yin//yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam tshes ngag/lo grangs dgu khri'i
454b4(mdo sde): bar du gnas par 'gyur//rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te//dpag tshad de bzhi pa bkod pa yid du 'ong //de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams sgron me yi//skye ba'i
454b5(mdo sde): yul ni sgron ma'i tog ces bya//rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad//dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni lha bzang yin//grags mchog ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//sras po
454b6(mdo sde): 'phrul can mthu rtsal rim gr-I pa//mchod rten grags zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste//gzungs kyi rgyal po zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa lan grangs drug cu kun la yang //srid
454b7(mdo sde): pa kun las rnam grol yid ldan pa//bye ba phrag ni drug cu lnga lnga yod//mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong yin//yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag/lo gangs
455a1(mdo sde): bdun khri drug stong bar du gnas//'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag/rgyas par 'gyur te zhing rnams gang bar 'gyur//sems can snying po bkra
455a2(mdo sde): shis ldan pa yi//skye bo'i yul ni gzi brjid gsal zhes bya//rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad//dpag tshad khri yod yab ni lha dbang yin//spyod pa can
455a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yumo//sras po yid 'ong snang ldan rim gro pa//chos kyi 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa ste//yon tan mchog la gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa lan
455a4(mdo sde): grangs dgu bcu gsum kun la'ang //srid pa'i mdud pa thams cad rnam grol ba//bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu lnga lnga yod//mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin//mya ngan
455a5(mdo sde): 'das pa de yi dam chos dag/lo gangs dgu khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur//sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad brgyad pa gcig/gser dang nor bu'i lnga lngas mdzes par
455a6(mdo sde): byas/rgyal ba yul 'khor mya ngan med pa yi//skye ba'i yul ni mya ngan sel zhes bya//rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad//dpag tshad dgu bcu yab ni dul ba
455a7(mdo sde): yin//nyes pa spong zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//sras po che la 'dor drag shul rim gro po//yon tan mig ces bya ba mkhas pa ste//grags pa rnam par sprul
455b1(mdo sde): pardzu 'phrul can//'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang //dul ba'i yid ldan bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can//bye ba phrag ni brgya brgya 'dus par 'gyur//mi tshe lo
455b2(mdo sde): grangs brgyad khri sum stong yin//dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni//brgyad cu rtsa gsum bar du gnas par 'gyur//'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag/rgyas
455b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur te zhing rnams gang bar 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros sems pa yi//skye ba'i yul ni yid tshi ma byed ces bya//rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad//
455b4(mdo sde): dpag tshad stong yod rdzu 'phrul lha ni yab//yid gnyis 'dod ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//sras po lta byed nges pa rim gro pa//shes rab 'phags zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste//mchog
455b5(mdo sde): rgyal brtul zhugs zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu gcig kun la'ang //bgo chags pha mthar phyin pa'i bsam gtan pa//bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu gnyis
455b6(mdo sde): gnyis yod//mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri lnga stong yin//yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur//sku gdung mchod
455b7(mdo sde): rten dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa//gcig ste nor bu bzang po'i dra bas spros//de bzhin gshegs pa blo dang ldan pa yi//skye bo'i yul ni shes rab gsal zhes bya//rgyal ba'i
456a1(mdo sde): rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad//dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni chos bzang yin//thar pa'i brtul zhugs zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum//sras po tog ldan
456a2(mdo sde): legs sems rim gro pa//bdud rtsi dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste//bkod pa gsul zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul tsan+da//'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang //srid
456a3(mdo sde): pa'i rgya mtsho'i phra mthar phyin pa po//bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu gnyis gnyis yod//mi tshe lo grangs dgra ni brgyad khri yin//snang ba med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag/lo
456a4(mdo sde): grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur//rgyal ba'i mchod rten dpag tshad bcu gsum pa//rin chen mang po'i dra bas mdzes par byas//de bzhin gshegs pa
456a5(mdo sde): chos kyi sgron ma spyan//skye ba'i yul ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan yin//rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad//dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni blo gos can//zla mchog
456a6(mdo sde): ma zhes bya ba rgyalo ba'i yu mo//sras po zlas byin 'jam pa'i rim gro pa//spobs pa sems ni blo gros can yin te//'khrugs pa med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can//
456a7(mdo sde): 'dus pa la no grangs drug cu bzhi kun la'ang //nga rgyal sred pa'i dra ba 'jig pa po//bye ba phrag ni drug cu lnga lnga yod//mi tshe lo grangs drug khri drug stong yin//yongs
456b1(mdo sde): su mya ngan 'das nas dram chos drag/lo grangs drug khri lnga skyong bar du gnas//thugs rje can gyi sku gdung rgyas 'gyur la//rin chen bye ba dag gis rab tu brgyan//'jig rten
456b2(mdo sde): mgron po shin tu gzigs pa yi//skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid sgron zhes bya//rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad//dpag tshad lnga brgya yab ni zhum med yin//blo brtan
456b3(mdo sde): 'dzin ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//sras po blo ldan blo bzang rim gri pa//rnam par snang byed ces bya mkhas pa ste//'jig rten sgra la 'jug pa rdzu 'phrul cen+da//'dus pa len grangs
456b4(mdo sde): drug cu kun la yang //dug rtsa bcad dang mtshungs pa'i dgra bcom pa//bye ba phrag ni drug cu gsum gsum yod//mi tshe lo grangs drug khri sum stong yin//rgyal ba mya ngan
456b5(mdo sde): 'dis nas dam chos dag/lo grangs drug khri drug stong bar du gnas//'jig rten phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag/rgyas 'gyur khams gsum dag tu gang bar 'gyur//
456b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa shugs kyis 'dor ba yi//skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba gsal zhes bya//rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi ched//dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni legs
456b7(mdo sde): byin yin//mchog sbyin 'jug ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//sras po zla ldan zlas byin rim gro pa//rdo rje'i 'gros zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste//'byor pa gsal zhes bya ba rdzu
457a1(mdo sde): 'phrul can//'dus pa lan grangs bdun nu kun la yang //dri med tshul 'chos med pa'i dgra bcom pa//bye ba phrag ni bdun cu bzhi bzhi yod//
457a2(mdo sde): mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin//rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag/lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur//'gro la phan phyir byams ldan rgyal
457a3(mdo sde): ba yi//sku gdung rgyas 'gyur rnam par gong bar 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa stobs can skye ba yi//yul ni gdul bar dka' ba zhes kyang bya//rgyal ba'i rigs
457a4(mdo sde): ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshod//dpag tshad sum cu yab ni zhum med yin//bsod nams can zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//sras po skrun byang gnyi ga rim gro pa//nor bu
457a5(mdo sde): rkang zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste//gser sgron zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul can//de na 'dus pa lan grangs drug cu ste//thams cad dag la bya bo dag ni phrag/dgu bcu rtsa ni
457a6(mdo sde): bzhi bzhi tshong bar 'gyur//mi tshe lo grangasra brgyad khri brgyad stong yin//'khrugs pa med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag/lo grangs dgu khA nyis stong bar du gnas//
457a7(mdo sde): sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad rangs pa gcig/nir bu'i gdugs dang bkod pa bla brer ldan/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab me tog gi/skye ba'i yul ni mkhas
457b1(mdo sde): pagasal zhes bya//rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi zad//dang ga chad gsum yod yab ni dbyen med yin//'brug sgra zhes ni bya ba rgyal ba'i yul//sras po sgom
457b2(mdo sde): byed dul ba rim gro pa//yon tan 'od bzang zhes bya mkhas pa ste//lha yi gzhal med mtshungs pa rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa lan grangs lnga bcu kun la yang //dgra bcom
457b3(mdo sde): bdud rnams 'joms par byed pa po//bye ba phrag ni lnga bcu lnga lnga yod//mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri lnga stong yin//yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag/lo grangs bzhi
457b4(mdo sde): khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur//rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la//mchod rten bzang pos stong gsum gang bar 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa'i dbyangs
457b5(mdo sde): ske ba'i//yul ni dag shul sgra dag 'byung zhes bya//rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad//dpag tshad dgu stong yab ni gnas pa mchog/gser gyi mdog ces bya ba
457b6(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i yum//'jig rten lam sras sgron mi rim go pa//yon tan mchog ces bya ba mkhas pa ste//ku mu da yi snying po rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa lan grangs drug cu gnyis
457b7(mdo sde): kun la'ang /bag chags rtsa nas bton po'i dgra bcom pa//bye ba phrag ni drug cu brgyad brgyad yod//mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin//yongs su mya ngan 'das
458a1(mdo sde): nas dam chos dag/lo grangs drug khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur//'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag/rgyas 'gyur zhing rnams rnam par gang
458a2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur//sems can snying po bde dang ldan pa yi//skye yul gzi brjid yid du 'thad ces bya//rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad//dgu bcu rtsa dgu ljon
458a3(mdo sde): pa'i dbang po yab//me tog sgron ma zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum//sras po tsam ka mchog ma rim gro pa//brtul zhugs lha zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste//bkod pa mi 'khrugs
458a4(mdo sde): pa ni rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu rtsa lnga la//dgra bcom thams cad tha ba spangs pa po//sa dag dang ni mtshungs pa sha stag go/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri
458a5(mdo sde): sum stong yin//rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur//rgyal ba'i mchod rten dpag tshad bcu gcig pa/
458a6(mdo sde): rin chen brgya yi dra bas mdzes par byas//de bzhin gshegs pa don dag gsung ba yi//skye ba'i yul ni smra ba gsal zhes bya//rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi
458a7(mdo sde): tshad//dpago tshad nyis stong yab ni zla bzangs yin//sprin gyi 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//sras pa 'od ldan snang po rim gro pa//snang ba byed ces bya ba blo can
458b1(mdo sde): te//yid 'ong gsal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa dag ni lan grangs ther 'bum phrag/bcu ste thams cad la yang byasam gtan pa//ther 'bum ther 'bum dag ni
458b2(mdo sde): 'dus par 'gyur//mi tshe lo grangs dag ni 'bum yang yin//yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag/lo grangs stong snyed kho nar gnas par 'gyur//'gro la phan
458b3(mdo sde): phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag/rgyas 'gyur zhing rnams rnam par grang bar 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa gsal ba yi//skye ba'i yul ni dga' byed mchod ces bya///
458b4(mdo sde): rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad//dpag tshad 'bum yod mi 'khrugs pa ni yab//bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//sras po bdud rtsi rnam grol rim gro pa//srong
458b5(mdo sde): gre'i nga ro zhes bya mkhas pa ste//granus pa'i mi 'khrugs pa ni rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa lan grangs sum cu drug kun la'ang //thams cad gnas shes pa la mkhas papo///
458b6(mdo sde): bye ba phrag ni sum cu lnga lnga yod//mi tshwa lo grangs sum khri drug stong yin//yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag/lo grangs drug khri drug steng bar du gnas//
458b7(mdo sde): gdung mchod rten dpag ched gsum pa gcig/rin chen mtshig gi dra bas mdzes par byas//de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i zhal skye bo'o//yul ni smra ba'i mchod rten zhes//
459a1(mdo sde): kyang bya//de yi rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad//dpag tshad stong yod yab ni gzi brjid bzang //gos la dga' zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//sras po
459a2(mdo sde): kha sgyur legs gnas rim gro pa//ye shes zil gyis gnon pa mkhas pa ste//mya ngan med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu kun la yang //
459a3(mdo sde): gti mug med pa'i pha mthar phyin 'phags pa//bye ba phrag ni bdun cu brgyad brgyad yod//mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong yin//mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag
459a4(mdo sde): lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur//'gro ba'i don dang phan phyir rgyal ba yi//sku gdung dag ni rnam par rgyas par 'gyur//mi yi 'dren pa gtsug phung skye ba
459a5(mdo sde): yI//yul ni rin chen brtsegs pa zhes kyang bya//de'i rigs bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad//dpag tshad bdun cu yab ni tog bzang yin//snang ba sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal
459a6(mdo sde): ba'i yum//sras po lha legs sgra gcan rim gro pa//spobs pa dran pa blo gros can yin te//rnam par sprul pa'i tog ni rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa lon grangs brgyad
459a7(mdo sde): cu drug kun la'ang //'jigs pa med pa'i gnas mchog thob pa po//bye ba phrag ni ngargyang cu bdun bdun yod//mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin//rgyal ba mya
459b1(mdo sde): 'das nas dam chos dag/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur//rgyal ba thugs rje chen po mtshungs med pa'i//sku gdung dag ni rnam par rgyas par 'gyur//mi yi
459b2(mdo sde): 'dren pa snang ba mdzad pa yi//skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid grags zhes bya//rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad//dpag tu med pa yab na legs mthong yin//blta bar
459b3(mdo sde): 'os zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum//sras po mthu rtsal mngar can rim gro pa//snang bar byed pa blo gros can yin te//chags meng giti mug med pa rdzu 'phrul can//'dus pa thun mong
459b4(mdo sde): ma yin dpag tu med//mi rnams dag gi tshe tshad dpag tu med//sangs rgyas dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi//mdzad pa ji snyed pa kun des mdzad 'gyur//'jig rten phan phyir
459b5(mdo sde): sems can snying po dag/mya ngan 'das nas dam chos gnas 'gyur ba'i//lo grangs stong phrag dag ni mtha' yang yas//rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur//de skad
459b6(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das logs so legs so//bskal
459b7(mdo sde): pa bzang po pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gang dang gang dag la dang por byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba gang
460a1(mdo sde): dang gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bkur stir bgyis nas/byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag lung bstan du gsol/de skad ces gsol
460a2(mdo sde): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po lnga 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de'i phyir legs par rab
460a3(mdo sde): tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do//byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so zhes gsol nas bcom ldan
460a4(mdo sde): 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gis ni//de bzhin gshegs pa mi yi zla de
460a5(mdo sde): la//gser las byas pa'i gdugs dag phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub phreng rgyud che//de bzhin
460a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs de la//sna ma'i me tog dag gi phreng ba phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs 'od srung bram ze'i bur gyur che//de
460a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa'i mchog de la//ska rags dag ni dbul bar byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//nga ni sngon tshe dman par gyur pa na//
460b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub de la//'jams gang zhig ni dbul bar byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'khor
460b2(mdo sde): lo sgyur ba yi//rgyal po rnam par snang byed ces byar gyur pa na//bde gshegs mthu chen gdugs tshod dag la spyan drangs nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de
460b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dag gis no//de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro snyan de la//phyag dar khrod kyi lhan pa thol mo tsam//phul nas dang por byang chub sems bskyed do//
460b4(mdo sde): bde gshegs rab gsal tshong par gyur pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'od de la//nor bu rin po che dag phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do///
460b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa dag gis ni//de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'thad gzigs de la//mu tig dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems
460b6(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs me tog grong khyer brten pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur de la//la tu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
460b7(mdo sde): bskyod do//de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gnyis pa yis//bde gshegs mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal de la//tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por
461a1(mdo sde): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa spyan legs khyim bdag tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa legs par sgra sgrogs la//khang pa brtsegs
461a2(mdo sde): pa dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa ded dpon dag gis ni//de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa mthong de la//tsan+dan
461a3(mdo sde): dmar po'i khri'u dgra phul nas kyang //drang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs lag chen rol mo mkhan gyur che//de bzhin gshegs pa mchog grags
461a4(mdo sde): grong khyer du//bde gshegs de la gling bus mchod nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs stobs chen spos 'tshong bur gyur tshe//bde
461a5(mdo sde): gi shogs seng blo grong khyer gshegs pa na//a kra ru yi rdog ma phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rgyu skar rgyal po phyugs
461a6(mdo sde): rdzi'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs byin de la ni//kha la'i me tog dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rtsi sman shing
461a7(mdo sde): rta mkhan gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa dri zhim de la ni//ting lo mar me bcas pa phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni se mos bskyed do//bde gshegs
461b1(mdo sde): sbyin pa thag par gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mar me'i glog 'gyul//ras kyi kha tshar drag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs
461b2(mdo sde): trotog zhing par gyur pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i 'od zer lo//me tog sil ma dag gis gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyod do//bde gshegs
461b3(mdo sde): 'od chen grong khyer brten pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma chen po ste//drang srong de la mar me phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
461b4(mdo sde): grol phung lha mo mkhan gyur pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs de la//mchil lham zung cig dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do///
461b5(mdo sde): bde gshegs rnam snang 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis 'joms de la//ta la'i bi ti brgyad khri bzhi stong phul//dang por byang chub tu ni
461b6(mdo sde): sems bskyed do//bde gshegs nyi snying bram ze'i bur gyur che//de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas la//ko sha tA ke'i me tog phul nas kyang //dang por byung
461b7(mdo sde): chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bad gshegs zla ba gser mgar bur gyur che//de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal de la//rin po che yi sdong bu phul nas kyang //dang por
462a1(mdo sde): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs 'od 'phro grong khyer brten pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'od du la//d+hU yi sgron ma ngan rna/
462a2(mdo sde): phul nas kyang //dang par byang chub tu ni sem sde bskyed do//bde gshegs 'od bzong nags rdul sbyang gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'ad gzi brjid la//tsam+baka
462a3(mdo sde): yi me tog phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni soms bskyed do//bde gshegs mya ngan med pa tshong dpon bus//de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis rnam 'jig la//kar
462a4(mdo sde): ni ka yo me tog phul nas kyang //drang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs skur rgyal khyim bdag bur gyur che//de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams sgron de la/
462a5(mdo sde): nor bu rin chen mchil lham zung cig pu'o//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rab gsal rgya mtsho 'tshang ba'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa legs
462a6(mdo sde): par mthong de lta//tsan+dan dmar po'i gzims khri dul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs phreng thogs khyim bdag bur gyur tshe//de bzhin
462a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa yid 'ong gzi brjid la//ka ka ni yaM'i bdug spos gsol nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs yon tan 'od ni gser tog
462b1(mdo sde): tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mtshungs pa med de la//me tog gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs don gzigs 'khor los
462b2(mdo sde): sgyur rgyal che//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dadrug med mdzod la//khang pa brtsegs pa stong skyeng phu la nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs mar me spos
462b3(mdo sde): 'bru mar 'chang bur gyur che//de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rol par spang ba gang //bye ba drug ts+tsha'i 'khor bcas dag la khrus khang cig/phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
462b4(mdo sde): do//bde gshegs mthu ldan gos 'tshong gyur pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rgyas de la//ras bcos leb lob po dag phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
462b5(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs sman pa sman pa'i bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshon bral de la//spos kyi ri lu dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
462b6(mdo sde): do//bde gshegs nges pa 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags 'joms mdzad de la//mar me kha cig dngul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
462b7(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs mdzod spu phreng rgyud mkhan gyi che//de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs de la//ut+pal dmar po dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni
463a1(mdo sde): sems bskyed do//bde gshegs brtan ldan stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub la ni//rin po che las
463a2(mdo sde): byas pa'i gradan khrigangs brgyad cu//rtsa bzhi phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs lha dpal rgya mtsho'i tshong par gyur pa'i che//de bzhin gshegs
463a3(mdo sde): po gzi brjid phung po 'od de la//nor bu rin chen bla bre dpag tshad gcig snang ba//phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bdi gshegs gdul dga' shing 'tshong
463a4(mdo sde): gyur pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa brtan par gshegs de la//tshoms shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs
463a5(mdo sde): pa yon tan rgyal mtshan chu'i//sbyin bdag gyur tshe bde gshegs yid 'ong grags//de la chu snod dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde
463a6(mdo sde): gshegs sgro gcan phreng rgyu mkhan bu'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzugs de la//gser gyi mchil lham zung cig phul nos kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
463a7(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs tshogs can khrus par gyur pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rab dang ba la//khrus kyi che ba dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub
463b1(mdo sde): tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs dbyangs phyugs rdzir gyur pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs spyan dang por mngon rdzogs par//sangs rgyas gyur pa'i tshe
463b2(mdo sde): na de la phye bre gang //phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs tshigs brtan 'gron bu 'tshong ba'i bur//gyur tshe bde gshegs mi g.yor gshegs pa
463b3(mdo sde): la//'gron bu spar gang gtor de phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs mi 'gying rgyal bu dga' 'dod tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa
463b4(mdo sde): mtha' yas la//glu dbyangs dag gis mchod pa byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs 'od mdzad 'khor lo sgyur rgyal tshe//de bzhin gshegs
463b5(mdo sde): pa gzi brjid brtsegs 'od la//na bza' rin po tsho dag phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po chen po yis//de bzhin gshegs
463b6(mdo sde): pa blo gnas de la ni//me tog mya ngan tshang ba bdun phul nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rdo rje lha dbang brgya byin du//gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs
463b7(mdo sde): pa brtan pa la//me tog man+dA ra ba'i char phab nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa sdom can 'dzam gling gi/rgyal por gyur tshe bde
464a1(mdo sde): gshegs par dgyes lta//gse las byas pa'i bya bre phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs mi bsnyengs rol mo
464a2(mdo sde): bla da gyur /deban rlu ga shegs pa mi 'jigs sbyin de'o//rlol ma'i bkur na badrung sa nas kyang //dang por byung chubatu ni sems bskyed de//bde gshegs
464a3(mdo sde): rin chen blo mchog gyur pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi mdzod de la//spos kyis bskyis pa'i phreng ba phul nas kyang //dang par byang chub tu ni sems bskrad do//
464a4(mdo sde): bdeg shegs pade sbyin 'khrul 'khor ma khan gyur //de bzhin gshegs bkun tu gzigs de la//khre'u bzeng gcig cig dngul ba byas nas kyi //dang por bya
464a5(mdo sde): rlu rkyen sa su mye //bdag shegs sa rnam pa'i man pa ni//de bzhin ga shegs pa bzhin pa ldan //m+WAR+Sha ri mI d+mos sprul nas kyang //
464a6(mdo sde): chub tu ni sems daskyed do//bdag shegs me tog 'du zer gas rI mgar gyi//byur gyur chenA bde gshegs ku ni gzugs la//rin gyi che la phreng byu dul nas kyang //
464a7(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems skyed do//'dug shegs shes dgyes byas pa rgyan bya//de can ni gshegs pa yul phyags kun mtshang //mig dang gas /
464b1(mdo sde): ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs gzi chen tshong dpon bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rab dpal de la//na bza'i zla bre dag //
464b2(mdo sde): ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyod do//dade gshegs tshangs pa bag chos mkhan gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa bla ma la//sha Sha rA yi ri lu phul
464b3(mdo sde): nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu na sems bskyed do//bde gshegs 'od dpag med pa bla ma'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i 'od de la//gdugs gcig cig ni
464b4(mdo sde): dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa klu sbyin phreng rgyud tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam bsgyings la//me tog dag
464b5(mdo sde): gi chun po phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs brtan gshegs nor bu mkhan gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis spong de la//rin
464b6(mdo sde): po che yi dra ba phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs don yod mthong ba nad pa'i gsos sman la//sbyor mkhas bur gyur tshe na dge slong dge 'dun //
464b7(mdo sde): dang//spyan drangs nad sman sbyar nas bde ga shegs legs mthong la//dang po kho nar byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs brtson 'grus sbyin pa 'khor los sgyur
465a1(mdo sde): rgyal tshe//tsan+dan dmar po dag las gtsug lag khang brgya stong //byas te rus bcos g.yogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa po//bdud rtsi'i stobs la
465a2(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs bzang skyong gis ni bde gshegs zla ba'i 'od//nyan thos bcas pa'i dge 'dun 'khor ldan khri phrag bcu//zhag
465a3(mdo sde): bdun par du zhal zas ro ni brgya ljon pas//tshim par mdzad de dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs dga' bo rtsal chen bram ze'i bur//gyur tshwa de
465a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mchod grags la//yu ba nor bus spras pa'i rnga yab gcig/phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa 'chi med
465a5(mdo sde): rgyal po yi//pho nyar gyur tshe bde gshegs dbang spras la//pany+tsa li yi 'bras bu phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs seng ge'i
465a6(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan zhing pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro gsal de la//skyu ru ra yi 'bras bu phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rgyal
465a7(mdo sde): bo tshal gyi las byed tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med 'khor lo lo//a ru re yi 'bras bu phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin
465b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa chos ldan dpa' bo'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i nga ro la//rgyal mtshan dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
465b2(mdo sde): bde gshegs mchog dga' rgyal po spos 'tshong tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mchod rten la//phye ma spar gang phul te gtor nos kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
465b3(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs kha lo sgyur ba byis pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul la//pa la ba ta gsum zhig phul nas kyang //dang poraro byang chub tu ni sems
465b4(mdo sde): bskyod do//bde gshegs dga' gshegs rgyal po'i bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po la//dngul gyi me tog dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub
465b5(mdo sde): tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs po chu lha tshong pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog dpag med la//lhung bzed sbrang rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang //dang por byang
465b6(mdo sde): chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs yon tan lag ni rtse ba'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen de la ni//'chag sa khru brgyad khor yug bkram nas kyang //dang por
465b7(mdo sde): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs spos glang spos 'tshong bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa rnam gol gyi//'chags spos kyi chu yis chag chag btab//
466a1(mdo sde): /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyod do//bdog shegs rnam gzigs gas 'chang gyur pa'i che//de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa sgrib med la/
466a2(mdo sde): me rtag gi ni gdug sa dag tshul nas myed//dang por byang chub tu rna rnams bskyed //bdag shugs 'brug sgra rdza mkham gyur pa tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa med
466a3(mdo sde): stabs de la//spos dang rol bgacig cig rdul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bad /shegs legs sems khye'u legs ma lon pa'i tshe//de bzhin
466a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa kun tu rnam gzigs la//pad+ma dag ni dbul ba byas nos kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//ba gshegs yod bzang tshod dben par
466a5(mdo sde): gyur te//de bzhin gshegs brtul sbyin de 'i ni//snga ma'i me tog phung ba phrul nas kyang /dang por byang chub dz+nyA ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs dri med thag par
466a6(mdo sde): //de bzhin shegs pa ljags mtheng de la//'ba'adon cig bul ba byas nas kyang //ngang por byung chub tu ni sems bskyed de//badzig shegs
466a7(mdo sde): bad+ma chen 'ardul ba'i tsho//de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs bzang de la ni//me tog phreng ba khrug 'phrul nas kyang //dang par byang chub tu ni sems bskyed du///
466b1(mdo sde): gshegs grags chen grong khyer brten pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros grags de la//me tog dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
466b2(mdo sde): do//bde gshegs btsug ni nor bu khye'u'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bkod de la//sa rdul spar gang dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyod do//
466b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul lha'i bu'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa sba ba'i 'od de la//lha yi gzhal med khang cig phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
466b4(mdo sde): bde gshegs sang stabs gdugs mkhan gyur pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa thar par bzhud de la//che ba'i dus che lo ma'i gdugs phul nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems
466b5(mdo sde): bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa ljon pa phyugs rdzi'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bkod de la//lam gyi shing drung dag tu be'u ras phul//dang por byang chub tu ni
466b6(mdo sde): sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rnam rgyal ba lang rdzi yi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo de la//lhung bzed 'o mas bkang ste phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni
466b7(mdo sde): sems bskyed do//bde gshegs shes rab brtsegs pa dge slong che//de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog de la//nyin gcig rangs par chos kyi gdan phul nas//dang por
467a1(mdo sde): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs legs gnas lham mkhan gyur pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo'i blo de la//mchil lham
467a2(mdo sde): rim pa gcig pa phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros las byed tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i blo gros la//
467a3(mdo sde): ro dang ldan pa'i btung ba phul nas kyang //dong por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs yan lag skyes ni mi 'dzin che//de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs bzang
467a4(mdo sde): de la ni//khrus rAs dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa blo mtha' yas pa ni//lam ston gyur tshe bde gshegs
467a5(mdo sde): bden sprul//shing drung gnas mal dngul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs bzang sde dpon tshe//de bzhin
467a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa skad dbyangs de la ni//me tog ut+pal lnga zhig phul nus kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs mkhyen ldan mgon gnas dge slong che//
467a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong de yi//'chag sa'i byi dor dag ni byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs 'od zer shing rta
467b1(mdo sde): mkhan gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas la//nyal khri stong rib dag phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa
467b2(mdo sde): brtul zhugs brtan pA ni//phreng rgyud mkhan che bde gshegs yid 'ong sems//de la me tog bla bre phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin
467b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa bkra shis shing thun tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i shing rta la//bu yug langs tshe sdang ma bltam nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
467b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa bden tog khrus pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan me tog la//kha ga dong bkru ba dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
467b5(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs pad+ma tshad dpon bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od zer la//pad+ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
467b6(mdo sde): bskyod //de bzhin gshegs pa sred med bu ni spos 'tshong che//de bzhin gshegs pa gdul byar dka' zhes bya ba de'i//khang pa brtsegs pa tsan+dan dmar pos byugs nas
467b7(mdo sde): kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyeng ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa lag bzang rgyal po'i pho nya'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs skar sgrogs par mdzad pa gang //
468a1(mdo sde): 'khor bcas bye ba dag la chos gos gsum phul nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas ni//
468a2(mdo sde): tshachen po cher gyur g.yul ngor cha sngo pa'i tshe//bde gshegs legs mthong la ni rgyal mtshan gcig/phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs
468a3(mdo sde): pa 'od 'phro sman pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa skye bo'i mchod rten la//spos kyi reng bu dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyod do//de bzhin gshegs
468a4(mdo sde): pa tshangs byin lam ston tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen zhes bya ba//de la lam dag mtshan pa byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
468a5(mdo sde): rin chen 'byung gnas mnyam pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa rdzi ba med gshegs de//nyan thos 'khor bcas bye ba bsgral nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
468a6(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs lha yi me tog nor bu mkhan//gyur tshe de bzhinu gshegs pa blo gsal la//nor bu rin chen spras pa'i gdugs phul nas//dang por byang chub
468a7(mdo sde): tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs don legs sems pa rgyal bu'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa gsung snyan de la ni//nor bu rin chen spras pa'i bla bre phul//deng
468b1(mdo sde): por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs chos kyi dbang phyug shing mkhan gyi//bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs skar 'od kyi//gshegs zam dag ni bsham pa
468b2(mdo sde): byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs blo grags kun dga' ra srung tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i sgron de la//mon sran gre'u'i me
468b3(mdo sde): tig phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni semaso bskyed do//bdag shegs spros brtsegs tshong pa'i bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog de la//sbyin pa
468b4(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pas spyan drangs nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan ni//chel gyi las byed tshe na de bzhin gshegs//
468b5(mdo sde): bsod nams bkod de lo nI a mra phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa phan bzhed grong dpon bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams
468b6(mdo sde): 'od ces bya ba las//nyin gcig srog gcod spong ba'i bslab gzhi mnos nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rnam rol grong rdal byis pa'i tshe//
468b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas la//lhung bzed sbrang rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa mun
469a1(mdo sde): dang bral ba yis//de bzhin gshegs pa srid mtha' gzigs de la//mon sran gre'u 'bru mar me bzhag phul nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
469a2(mdo sde): bde gshegs sgra gcan lha ni grong brten tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bar gzigs de la//he sta brna ka dag phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
469a3(mdo sde): bde gshegs ri bo'i rgyal mtshan tshogs ldan gyi//khye'ur gyur tshe bde gshegs mtha' yas 'od //de la me tog chun po phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do///
469a4(mdo sde): bde gshegs tshogs can 'od ni phreng rgyud tshe//de bzhi ni gshegs pa yid 'ong dbyangs de la//me tog las byas bla bre phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
469a5(mdo sde): bde gshegs rin chen snying po khrus pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung ba la//kha gdong bkru ba dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde
469a6(mdo sde): gshegs shin tu mthor gshegs grong khyer brten pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims stabs de grong khyer du//gshegs pa'i tshe na gdon dag bshams te bting nas kyang //
469a7(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs skar rgyal da nur mkhan gyi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor lha de la//zhal zas bca' ba rnams ni phul nas
469b1(mdo sde): kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs du rings gzhan gyi khol gyur te//de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dag 'drel//lhung bzed 'jam gyis bkang
469b2(mdo sde): ste phul nus kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs yon tan grag sra pa bsod snyoms tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas la//gos kyi ras ma
469b3(mdo sde): sor bzhi tsam phul nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zlas bde gshegs srid sbyin de//'khor bcas bye ba sum cu dag la gtsug lag khang //
469b4(mdo sde): bzang por longs spyod phyir dang dpag tshad bcu pa'i gos//phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs nyi 'od gzhan gyi khrol gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa
469b5(mdo sde): lhun po che de la//lcags kyi snod dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs skar mkhan chang pa'i bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs
469b6(mdo sde): pa phyogs gsal de la ni//nor bu rin chen dpag tshad gcig 'od ldan//phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa seng tog dang dpon gyi//bur
469b7(mdo sde): gyur tsha na de bzhin gshegs pa po//blo gros bzang la phreng ba phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen rgyal po ni//snyan
470a1(mdo sde): dngags mkhan tshe bde gshegs tsam mchog la//tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
470a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po yis//gzhan gyi dge 'dun bshos gsol yi rang nas//de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po la//dang por byang chub tu ni sems
470a3(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs srid mtha' gzigs pa tshal dag gi/las byed tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po//khyad par sems la cha ba gtsang phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub
470a4(mdo sde): tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs glog 'od rngon pa'i bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo'i sems de la//rtswa yi stan dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por
470a5(mdo sde): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs seng ges byin pa kham bdag gi/bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs pad snying la//sna ma'i me tog yod pa'i sa gzhi phul//dang
470a6(mdo sde): por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs gzhan gyis mau thub rgyal mtshan gyis//'jigs bcas lam du 'don pa'i bsel byas nas//de bzhin gshegs pa srad/
470a7(mdo sde): med bu de la//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs mchog dga' grags pa bu ram shing //mchir gyur tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po//blo rnam 'byed
470b1(mdo sde): la bu ram bcud khu phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs brtson 'grus brtan pa bram ze'i bur//gyur tshe bde gshegs 'od zer mtha' yas la//khrus
470b2(mdo sde): rkyen 'dag pa'i tshal dag phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs grags rdzogs chang 'tshong bur gyur che//de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i de re
470b3(mdo sde): la//lo ma'i snod nas chu dag phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs bsnyengs bral rgyal po'i bur gyur che//de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i
470b4(mdo sde): dA ro la//lo ma'i snod nas bana'i mye tog phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs mchod 'os lha ni blon mchog gyur pa'i tshe//bde gshegs yid 'ong blo
470b5(mdo sde): 'od dag la dpag tshad gcig/khor yug tsam gyi skyed mos tshol phul a ga ru'i//bdug pas bdugs te dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs sgron chen mi bkren
470b6(mdo sde): gyur pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'od de la//rtswa yi sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyod do//bde gshegs 'jig rten 'od ni lha'i
470b7(mdo sde): bru'i che//de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la//me tog men+dA ra ba'i gdugs phul nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs spos dri nim pa kyang gyur tshe//de bzhin
471a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa yan lag mdzes de la//khrus ras dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs yon tan mchog
471a2(mdo sde): 'dzin sman pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa rnyog pa med don la//bdug pa dang ni ngar yug phul nas kyang //dang par byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs mun dang
471a3(mdo sde): rnam bral rgyal po yi//mdun 'don bur gyur tshe na de bzhin gshegs//dgra bcom gze la mu tig rgyan phreng phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs
471a4(mdo sde): pa seng ge'i 'gram pa yis//de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la//'dom rdzab dag tu shing zam btsugs phul nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
471a5(mdo sde): rin chen gags pa spros 'tshong gi/bur gyur chen bde gshegs dbyangs mnga' la//phye ma spar gang dag na gtor phul nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde
471a6(mdo sde): gshegs skyon rab zhi ba rgyal bu'i tshe//busad bya btson ngag 'bros su btang nas kyang //de bzhin gshegs pas mchog de la ni//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
471a7(mdo sde): bde gshegs bdud rtsi 'chang ba grong dpon tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar de la ni//bai DUr+ya yi gdugs stong phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
471b1(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs mi zla phreng rgyud mkhan bu'i rgyu//de bzhin gshegs pa nges par sems de la//ut+pa la yi phreng ba phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
471b2(mdo sde): bskyod do//de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gzigs du ni//'dun dpon tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po//bden par gsung ba de la phreng ba phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems
471b3(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs rab brgyan gong khyer la brten pa'i//bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs mdangs 'od kyi//grong khyer sgo dag mdzes par byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub
471b4(mdo sde): tun sems bskyed do//bde gshegs no r-i 'od brgya byin gyur pa'i tshe//bde gshegs gzi brjid me tog rgyas pa la//dpag chad khor yug me tog char phab nas//drang por
471b5(mdo sde): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas kyis//bde gshegs grags tog shes rab pha rol phyin//gsung tshe legs gsungs zhes ni yi rang
471b6(mdo sde): phul//dang por bang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs don nges ldan pa tha ga par//gyur tshe bde gshegs yon tan gsal ba la//ras kyi kha char dag ni phul nas
471b7(mdo sde): kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs tshems sbyin blo chen bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron de la//bsil yab dag ni dbul
472a1(mdo sde): ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rin chen 'byung gnas gzhu mkhan tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa
472a2(mdo sde): gsal rab dpal dril//me tog snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs skye dbang mtshungs pa rdza
472a3(mdo sde): mkhan che//de bzhin gshegs pa zhal sdug sde bdag la//snod dag chu yis bkang ste phul nas kyang //dong por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
472a4(mdo sde): stobs gshegs zhing pa'i bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs bzhud la//zam stegs dag ni gzugs pa byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni
472a5(mdo sde): sems bskyed do//bde gshegs blo gnas shing srung bur gyur che//de bzhin gshegs pa skye bo'i mchod rten la//skye 'bru dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por
472a6(mdo sde): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs gdugs mdzes blon po'i bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i blo de la//tsam pa'i me tog phreng ba phul
472a7(mdo sde): nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo gser mgar che//de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i snying po la//bdug
472b1(mdo sde): pas bdugs pa'i me tog gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs shin tu 'phags dpal spos 'tshong bur//gyur tshe de bzhin
472b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa gdugs sde yi//'chag sa spos chus chog chag btab nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs seng ge'i sgra ni rnga mkhan
472b3(mdo sde): tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i rgyal po la//rnga bo che dag brdung ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rnam rol ldan pa dung
472b4(mdo sde): 'bud mkhan//gyur tshe bde gshegs nyi ma'i snying po de//grong khyer gshegs tshe dung dag bus nas kyang //dang po ro byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do///
472b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po nyi shu bzhi pa//de bzhin gshegs pa klu 'od zla ba'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa
472b6(mdo sde): byang chub dga' de la//rnga bo che dag brdung ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs me tog ri bo gar mkhan bur//gyur tshe//
472b7(mdo sde): bde gshegs dbang po zhi de yi//spyan sngar bro gar dag gis mchod nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs glu dga' gar
473a1(mdo sde): mkhan bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de la//rol mo'i sgra dgra bsgrags pa byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni
473a2(mdo sde): sems bskyed do//bde gshegs spos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po yi//sras mor gyur tshwa de bzhin gshegs pa po//pad dkar spos la mu ti go rgyanin phreng phul//
473a3(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs shin tu grags pa tshong dben gyi//chung mar gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po//lhun po'i 'od zer
473a4(mdo sde): spyi bor bla bri phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bad+ma gshegs stobs lha grong khyer brtan pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal de la//bshos
473a5(mdo sde): don lhung bzed bkang ste phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phreng ldan gyis//de bzhin gshegs pa
473a6(mdo sde): bsgyings ldan bzhud de la//sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal thal mo lan gsum sbyararo//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa klu lag grong
473a7(mdo sde): khyer gyi//sgo srung chen phyag dar byas nas kyang //de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs rnams lta de la//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs
473b1(mdo sde): pa mig brgyan rgyal bu'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od de la//chu dang skyu ru ra dag phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
473b2(mdo sde): tshul khrims gsal de snga dro zhig/de bzhin gshegs pa legs par sbyangs po'i blos//dga' bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran byas nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems
473b3(mdo sde): bskyed do//de bzhin goshegs pa zil gnon ye shes kyis//ngan 'gror 'gro ba tshul khrims la bkod nas//de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas blo de la//dang
473b4(mdo sde): bopor byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs mtha' yas spyan ni gos 'tshong tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzugs de la//ras bcos bla bre dag ni phul
473b5(mdo sde): nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs bden gsung khyim bdag bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus brtan de la//
