480b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer la//spos kyi ring bu dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa lhun brtsegs khral
480b7(mdo sde): mi'i tshe//bde gshegs yul 'khor kha lo sgyur de la//lhags pa'i dus su shing khur gcig phul nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs
481a1(mdo sde): pa dgra 'dul yang ba'i//dpyad mkhan chen bde gshegs legs mthong dag/'brog dgon bzhugs tshe lhang cher gdugs phul nas//dang por
481a2(mdo sde): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshugs pa pad+ma phreng rgyud tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bshes gnyen bzhed de la//pad+ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //
481a3(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni se mos bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom grags pa ni//nor bu mkhan tshe bde gshegs skal bzhed la//nor bu rin chen me shel
481a4(mdo sde): gcig phul nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs ye shes 'gros ni klu rgyal tshe//bde gshegs nyi zhal sos kwa'i dus dag tu//lam
481a5(mdo sde): du zhugs che char pa phab nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs nyon mongs bral ba gar mkhan tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa thogs
481a6(mdo sde): med spyan de la//me tog chun po dag ni phul nos kyang //dang por byangango chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs 'dam bu dbul po'i bur gyur tshe//dgon par
481a7(mdo sde): bde gshegs seng ge'i stabs de la//bshos dron dag ni dbu la ba byas nas kyang //dong por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs spos bzang bram
481b1(mdo sde): ze'i bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma che de la//lo ma dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
481b2(mdo sde): yul 'khor rangs ni shing bsrung tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bzhon par mdzad do la//bsil yab dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //drang por byang chub tu ni sems
481b3(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs lho grags grong khyer brten pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gsal de la//gso ras na bza' dag ni phul nos kyang //dang por
481b4(mdo sde): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs srid mtha' gzigs pa lam ston che//de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams snying po yi//lam srang dag ni mtshon pa
481b5(mdo sde): byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba spos 'tshong tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa chos de 'chad pa'i tshe//dus kyi rjes 'brang
481b6(mdo sde): spos ni zho gcig phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan las kyi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' de la ni//phyag
481b7(mdo sde): 'khar gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba rgyal bu'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa
482a1(mdo sde): bsnyengs med dgyes de la//ta la pa ta dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bdu gshegs seng ge'i rgyal mtshan rdza
482a2(mdo sde): mkhan che//de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab rgyal mtshan la//sum pa ka yi lhung bzed pu lo nas kyang //dang poro byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
482a3(mdo sde): bsam gtan dgyes pa grong khyer gyi//po nya'i tshe na bde gshegs mdangs 'od la//me tog chun po dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
482a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs ldan rngon pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa zlas byin de la ni//mig mi 'dzums par blta bar byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
482a5(mdo sde): bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa rnam rol rgyal bu'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dbyig de la//dpag tshad khor yug me tog cha la bkram phul//dang por
482a6(mdo sde): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs yon tan rin chen ljongs gtso'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'od de la//me tog tsam+ba ka dag phul nas kyang //
482a7(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni semos bskyed do//bde gshegs dgra bcom grags pa mnyan pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa po de ni//gru dag las ni bsgral ba byas
482b1(mdo sde): nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs pa dngos 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i tog de la//dri zhim zhabs ngasgra
482b2(mdo sde): bdag phul nus kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs mdzod spu ldan pa tshong pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs med nga rol//lhung
482b3(mdo sde): bzed zho yis bkang ste phul nas kyong //dang por byang chub tu nI sems bskyed do//bde gshegs spos grags tshong pa'i khol po'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu yin
482b4(mdo sde): tan+da la//lan tshwa srang 'ga' zhig ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje nor bu yis//de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar
482b5(mdo sde): pa'i tog de la//tshong sngon chad pa grang zhig bsod snyoms phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs tshe dpag med ni sman pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs
482b6(mdo sde): pasnyed med bu de la//myig sman ril lu dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyod do//bde gshegs nor bu bkod pa khye'u'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs
482b7(mdo sde): pa rin chen gsal ba yi//lam srang dag tu me tog dkar po phul//dang por byang chub tu ni se mos bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa dbong chen gyad kyi tshe//de bzhin
483a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa kun tu dgongs de la//ko dra pa yi 'bru dag phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs yon tan 'byung
483a2(mdo sde): gnas bram ze'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa legs sems de la ni//ril ba gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin
483a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa lhun po grags pa yis//phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun dag la rdzing phul nas//de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bzang po la//dang por byang chub tu ni sems
483a4(mdo sde): bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bcu pa lha'i bu'i tshe//bde gshegs gzi brjid mtha' yas byang chub snying por ni//snyoms par zhug sngo ba'i tshe na sor mo lnga
483a5(mdo sde): bsregs nas//dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs ma smad shing rta mkhon gyi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i phyag de la//lo ma
483a6(mdo sde): ngadag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni soms bskyed do//bde gshegs glang po'i 'gros ni grong khyer du//brtan pa'i tshe na bde ga shegs blo snang la//
483a7(mdo sde): sha ma ka dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs yid 'thad gonag lhas srung ba'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa lha
483b1(mdo sde): yi rgyal po la//dar bdag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rin chen zla ba lam ston tshe//bde gshegs bden
483b2(mdo sde): pa'i tog gi lam dag tu//gos kyi gdan dag gding ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba sman pa'i tshe//de bzhin
483b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa legs par gnas de la//ut+pa lA yi bkru sman phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rab gsal rgyal po spong brtson
483b4(mdo sde): pa'i//dge slong tshe na bde gshegs dpag med pa'i//lho li a yo ga dag phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs kha lo sgyur ba
483b5(mdo sde): ded dpon che//de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa'i me tog la//tsan+dan dmar po'i khang bzang phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
483b6(mdo sde): dga' ba'i dbang phyug phyug po'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sbyin chen po la//rol mo'i sgra yis mchod pa byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
483b7(mdo sde): do//bde gshegs gtsug na rin chen rtsis pa yis//khye'u tshe de bzhin gshegs pa tog tshan la//mtshungs pa med pa'i phye ma gtor nas kyang //dang por
484a1(mdo sde): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs bral rtswa 'tshong che//de bzhin gshegs pa nyi na'i 'od de lta//ka bid tA ya
484a2(mdo sde): phur ma phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs sgra gcan lha ni shing 'tshong tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od de la/
484a3(mdo sde): rgya las byas pa'i mchi la lham phulo nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs nu tshong bzang po grong srung che//grong khyer dag gi sgro ni
484a4(mdo sde): phye nas kyang //de bzhin gshegs pa rmya bya'i nga rol//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' sman pa'i tshe//de bzhin
484a5(mdo sde): go shegs pa kun tu rnam rgyal la//shau ri sha yi me tog gtor nos kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//badz+ra gshegs rin chen phung po smad
484a6(mdo sde): 'tshang ma'i//gtso mo'i tshe na bde gshegs 'byor 'od la//na ba ma li'i me tog gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
484a7(mdo sde): mdzes gshegs tshong dpon bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ni mtha' yas la//ut+pa la ni gcig cig phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu
484b1(mdo sde): ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs seng phyogs btso blag mkhan gyi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa snyan par dgyes de yi//na bza' bkru ba shal dag ni byas nas kyang //
484b2(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs shin tu 'thor gshegs glang po che'i//rdzi'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bde gshegs kyi//gradan ni 'ba'
484b3(mdo sde): tI shing drung btang nas kyang //dong por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs skye dbang grong khyer bsten pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i lha de la/
484b4(mdo sde): tre ka ni ya'i me tog phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs blo gros bzang po grong dpon tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' ya swa
484b5(mdo sde): gshegs de la//a mra'i lcug ma dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs 'jig rten 'od ni spos 'tshong tshe//de bzhin
484b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa yul 'khor lha de la//spos rnams dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rin chen gzi brjid bram
484b7(mdo sde): ze'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa blo zab de la ni//bal dang 'bros bu dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs skal ldan
485a1(mdo sde): shing rta rtswa 'tshong tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa sde yi 'gros de la//me tog chun po dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
485a2(mdo sde): bde gshegs kun rgyal 'khrul 'khor mkhan gyi tshe//de bzhin ge shegs pa zla ba'i 'od dro lA//dar gyi lda ldi dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
485a3(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs dga' ba bkod pa tshong dpon che//de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid phung po la//'o mar bcas pa'i 'bras can phul nas kyang //drang
485a4(mdo sde): por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa stegs ni mdzad pa po//shIng rta mkhan tshe bde gshegs dgyes chung la//shing las byas pa'i mchil
485a5(mdo sde): lha mau phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs spos kyi glang po khyim bdag tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal chen po la//rma
485a6(mdo sde): bya'i bsil yab dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs blo gros 'od 'phro rgyal po yi//btsun mo'i tshe na bde gshegs rgyal
485a7(mdo sde): sde la//me tog par shi chang pa gang phul nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs ri bo rgyal mtshan khye'u'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa don
485b1(mdo sde): grub gshegs de la//lag pa 'dag pa'i tshal dag phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa spos bzang tshong dpon tshe//de bzhin
485b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa zla ba sdug de la//me tog chun po dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs chos brtan nor bu mkhan gyi tshe//de bzhin
485b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa seng ge'i nga ro la//rin po che yi gdugs dag phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni semos bskyed do//bde gshegs gzi brjid drag shul gser mgar
485b4(mdo sde): tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa gsal de la//gser gyi me tog dag ni gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs chos kyi nor bu
485b5(mdo sde): dred dpon tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes phung po la//mu tig dmar po dag ni gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs bzang
485b6(mdo sde): byin grong khyer brten pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid me tog la//bshos dron bsod snyoms dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
485b7(mdo sde): bde gshogs zla ba phreng rgyud mkhan gyi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid phung po la//ut+pal lnga zhig gtor ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
486a1(mdo sde): do//bde gshegs tshangs dbyangs lag bla byed pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul 'od de la//tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas
486a2(mdo sde): kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//dode gshegs seng ge'i zla ba rgyal po yi//ngo nya byed tsho bde gshegs gzi mtha' yas//de la mtshal lhom dag
486a3(mdo sde): ni dbul byas naso//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs dpal ni tshong dpon por gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas la//
486a4(mdo sde): gser gyi phreng ba dag ni phul nasgo kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa legs skyes gser mgar tshwa//de bzhin gshegs pa
486a5(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying po la//rin po che yi sdong bu phul nos kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs thub med tshogs ni 'dun dpon bur gyur tshe//
486a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzod grags pa la//sbrang rtsi ro byas pa'i 'om dbul po byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
486a7(mdo sde): brags pa'i bshes gnyen tshong dpon gyi//bur gyur chen bde gshegs bden tog la//me tog dag gi phreng ba phul nos kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
486b1(mdo sde): do//de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa phreng rgyud tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid drag shul la//me tog chang pa gang zhig phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni
486b2(mdo sde): sems bskyed do//bde gshegs dka' thub chen po tshong dpon tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i tog de la//'khor rnams thams cad dbul ba byos nas kyang //
486b3(mdo sde): dang por byangango chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs lhun po'i 'od zer 'khor sbyar rgyal po'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po chen po de la ni//rin chen yu bar
486b4(mdo sde): bcas pa'i gdugs 'bum phul nos kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs yon tan brtsegs pa dad dpon bur gyur tshe//de bzhin
486b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa mchod pa bkod pa de la ni//rin chen snam bu'i lda ldi dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs mchod grags
486b6(mdo sde): rtsal tshan lta bu'i bram ze che//'khor ni bye bar bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegaso ba po//'jig rten rnam par grags la khrus kyi yo byad phul//dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni
486b7(mdo sde): sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa chos grags lam ston tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul byin pa yi//'tshogs dag ni phyag dar byas nas kyang //dang
487a1(mdo sde): por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin 'od dpa' bo'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu grags de la//rgyal mtshan
487a2(mdo sde): dag ni dbul ba byas nus kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa glog 'byin grong dpon tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa don grub
487a3(mdo sde): mthu rtsal la//gding ba dag ni dbul ba byos nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa bden gsung khyim bdag tshe//de bzhin
487a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa lha yis mchod de la//spring rtsir bcas pa'i 'bras can phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs 'tsho byed lha
487a5(mdo sde): ris pa yi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa po de yi//gtsug lag khang ni phyag dar byas nos kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde
487a6(mdo sde): gshegs na tshod bzang po rtswa 'tshong tshe//bde gshegs zil gyis mi non grags po la//rtswa yi sgron ma dag ni phul nos kyang //drang por byang chub tu ni sems
487a7(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs legs pa'i tshogs can 'khor sgyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 'od de la//na bza' rin po tsho dag phul nas kyang //
487b1(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rnam des blo gros tshong dpon gyi//bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa sgron chen la//mu ka can tra ka drag phul nas
487b2(mdo sde): kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa srid mtha' nor bu'i spos//rim gro pa tshe bde gshegs blo spyod la//chos kyi gdan dag
487b3(mdo sde): bsham pa byas nos kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//badri gshegs rgyal bas dgyes pa gos 'tsheng che//de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal can de
487b4(mdo sde): la//chos gos gsum dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs seng ge'i 'od zer lam ston tshe//de bzhin gshegs
487b5(mdo sde): pa thogs med gshegs pa po//lamo du zhugs tshe bskor ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad rin po che//
487b6(mdo sde): rtog shes tshan de bzhin gshegs pa po//yid gnyis spong po'i 'chags bshams nos kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa
487b7(mdo sde): grags mchog spos 'tshong tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs che de la//sna ma'i me tog chun po phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
488a1(mdo sde): bde gshegs thugs rab gzhungs pa phyag dar bu'i//bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa lha gsal la//mngon sum dag tu bstod pa byas nas kyang //
488a2(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs nor bu'i zla ba lta bu'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrul med gshegs de la//lho yi gzhal yas
488a3(mdo sde): khang dgo phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de//bde gshegs drag shul 'od zer dgon pa yi//dge slong tshe na bde gshegs yul 'khor lha//
488a4(mdo sde): de la chos gos snam sbyar phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs brtul zhugs thub med rgyal bu'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa
488a5(mdo sde): mdzes par dgyes dri lo//gdugs dang dar yug dag ni phul nas kyang //dong por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa 'gros mchod gdol bu'i
488a6(mdo sde): tshe//nyi ma 'ga' zhig bslab pa lnga mnos nas//de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dpol dri la//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs nor bu'i
488a7(mdo sde): tshogs ni brgya byin tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs sbyin de la//gser gyi shing rta rkyen bcas stong snyed phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
488b1(mdo sde): bde gshegs 'jig rten bla ma bram ze'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' de la ni//ma tu ka yi me tog gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
488b2(mdo sde): bde gshegs glang chen seng ge long ba'i tshe//dri bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i 'od de yi//'chag sa drag ni tshig chag btab nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
488b3(mdo sde): bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rgyal po'i bur gyur tshe//zla ba bzhir ni dge slong dge 'dun na bA yi//gsos sman dag la spyan drangs bde go shegs 'od 'phro
488b4(mdo sde): la//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rin chen 'od zer 'khor los sgyur ba yi//btsun mo'i tshe na bde gshegs yon tan 'byung gnas la//
488b5(mdo sde): yu ba nor bus spros pa'i rnga yab dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs sgra gcan sbed pa chen chen tshe//de bzhin gshegs
488b6(mdo sde): pa byams pa'i blo da ni//lam du zhugs tshe bsil ba'i rlung yab byos//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs yon tan rgya mtsho grong rdal gyi//byis
488b7(mdo sde): pa'i tshe na bde gshegs byang chub 'od//de la tshems shing dog ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs 'od zer ldan pa tshong
489a1(mdo sde): dpon gyi//bu che de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtshol//mar me'i kha ni stong snyed dul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde
489a2(mdo sde): gshegs rab tu zhi stabs gyad kyi tshe//de bzhin gshegaso pa byang chub dgyes de lnga//nor bus spras pa'i mchil lham phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
489a3(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs 'jig rten bzang po spos 'tshong bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa lha chen de la phye ma yis//bkang ba'i na bza' dang no pad+ma phul nas kyang //
489a4(mdo sde): dngango po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs mya ngan med pa gos 'tshong khye'u'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa blo ni zab mo de la yang //rdzi cher byung ba'i tshe
489a5(mdo sde): na me tog gdugs phul nas//dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni se mos bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa shugs bcu rgyal bu'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang
489a6(mdo sde): phyug can//lam du zhugs tshe gdan ngag phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs stobs dgyes rol mo mkhyen gyi tshe//de bzhin
489a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa gtso chen de la ni//dung sgra dag ni bud pa byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs mthu dpal rol mo'i glu mkhan che//de
489b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa blo gros sems de las//gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba mnos nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegasu la mthu thob
489b2(mdo sde): mnyan pa'i tshe//chu bo dag la zam pa btsugs nas kyang //de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od de lo//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs
489b3(mdo sde): pa mthu chen khrus pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa 'khrul med la//khrus ras dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde
489b4(mdo sde): gshegs yon tan snying po tshong dpon gyi//bu tshe bde gshegs bsod nams 'phags pa la//d+ha nu ska ra'i me tog gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
489b5(mdo sde): ngodo//de bzhin gshugs pa bden spyod spos 'tshang che//de bzhin gshegs pa nor lha'i bu grags la//spos kyi ri lu dag ni phul nas kyang //dong por byang chub tu ni semos
489b6(mdo sde): bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa dge mchog rgyal po rgyal po'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bkod chen sangs rgyas de la sogs//dge slong dag gi dge 'dun spyan ni
489b7(mdo sde): drangos nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal shing mkhan tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od ldan po//bde
490a1(mdo sde): klu shegs de la la sgyur phyug byas nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyod do//bdagu shugs 'od rjer chen notshal gyi las//byed
490a2(mdo sde): da gshegs lha yi 'od zer la//ljon pa'i rgyun dag sbyar te phul nas myong //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa glog 'od rdo mkhan
490a3(mdo sde): tshe//bde gshegs 'od gus pa de la zla ba bzhir//drim pa chu yis bkang ste phul nus kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs yon tan
490a4(mdo sde): rgyurgya chen nad pa'i tshe//de bzhin ga shegs pa bsod nams dgyes de la//lcags kyi snod dag dbul ba byos nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
490a5(mdo sde): byed gshegs rin po che ni tshong dpon gyi//bu tshe bde gshegs seng ge'i blo gros la//mu tig dag gi tshun phreng phul nus kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni semos bskyed
490a6(mdo sde): dro//de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'od spyos 'tshong gi/bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa sa gtsal//phye mas bkang ba'i ut+pal na bza' phulo//dang por byang chub tu
490a7(mdo sde): ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs go cha bgos pa lha'i bu'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od de la//bstod pa dag gis bstod pa byas nos kyang //
490b1(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs seng ge'i phyag ni tshal gyi las//byed tshe bde gshegs 'od zer bzang po la//me tog dag gi phur ma phul
490b2(mdo sde): nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs me tog bzang po yi go mkhan tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung de la//gro ba'i
490b3(mdo sde): glegs bam dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rin chen mthon po shal khyer tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sdug de la//
490b4(mdo sde): mer me dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rgya mtsho rol mo mkhyen gyi tshe//rngu bo che dag brdung ba byas nas kyang //
490b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa zlo ba'i gdugs de la//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa sa 'dzin mgar ba'i tshe//de bzhin goshegs pa kun
490b6(mdo sde): tu gzigs de la//mtshon cha dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs don blo lha'i bu nyi ma'i tshe//de bzhin
490b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa gos pa med de la//me tog mon+dA ra ba gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs yon tan bsags pa sman pa'i
491a1(mdo sde): tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa grags bla bzhud pa na//'dam rtsub dag tu rdo leb zam btsugs nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde
491a2(mdo sde): gshegs yon tan tshogs ni sman pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal de la//sgye ru ra yi 'bras bu gcig phul nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
491a3(mdo sde): do//bde gshegs rin chen mi ni ded dpon tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa klu yi lha de la//bai DUr+ya'i snod chu yis bkang ste phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyod
491a4(mdo sde): do//bde gshegs 'jig rten 'das pa tshong 'dus pa//byed tshe dge 'dun dag la 'od sgron phul//de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phung po lo//dang por byang chub tu
491a5(mdo sde): ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs 'jig rten zla ba 'khor sgyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan blo de la//gtsug lag khang ni stong snyed phul nas kyang //dang
491a6(mdo sde): por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan rgyal po bram ze'i bu//phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun dag gi bsam gtan khang brtsigs nas/
491a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mchog ma de la ni//dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs tshangs tog bram ze'i bu yi tshe//de bzhin
491b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'jig rten dga' de lnga//ku sha'i na bza' dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs tshogs can gtso bo bram ze'i
491b2(mdo sde): tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpag med la//ril ba chu yis bkang ste phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs seng
491b3(mdo sde): stabs gling gcig rgyal po'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i tog de la//ras bcos gding ba dpag tshad gcig pa phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
491b4(mdo sde): do//bde gshegs drag shul byin ni tshong dpon gyi//chung ma'i tshe na bde gshegs nyi 'od la//phye ma spur gang dag gis gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni
491b5(mdo sde): sems bskyed do//bde gshegs chos kyi dbang phyug phreng rgyud tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od zer la//me tog chal par bkram pa kun phul nas//dang
491b6(mdo sde): por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs gzi brjid 'od ni lha'i bu'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa ston par dgyes pa po//byang chub snying por bzhugs la rtswa
491b7(mdo sde): gdon phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs 'od zer chen po khyim bdag tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa gsang bar dgyes de la//ras
492a1(mdo sde): bAc+doMs bye ba snyed ni rdul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rin chen grags pa rgyal bu'i tshe//de bzhin
492a2(mdo sde): bshegs pa dbyig gi 'od zer la//bla bre spyos can dag ni phu lo nas kyang //drang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs tshogs can gsal ba rin
492a3(mdo sde): chen chong pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'byung gnas de la ni//rin po che dag sbar ba bkang ste gtor nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems//
492a4(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs grags pa mtha' yas ded dpon gyi//bu che badre gshegs me tog da la de la//na bza' bla bre dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub
492a5(mdo sde): tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs 'od zer don yod rgya mtsho'i tshong pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phyag ldan de la ni//mu tig dmar po sbyor ba
492a6(mdo sde): bkang ste gtoro nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs lha yi drang srong drang srong che//de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi spyan ma la//
492a7(mdo sde): lo ma dag gi gdugs dag phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs skye dbang ba'akhor los sgyur ba'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa
492b1(mdo sde): kun tu 'od zer la//gling bzhi drug ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyod do//bde gshegs dge 'dun brtan pa mtha' 'khob rgyal po'i tshe//
492b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs can de la ni//me tog stong stod bkram pa'i 'chag so phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin
492b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa phyogs bzang gser 'tshong tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po la//gser gyi glegs ma bkram po'i 'chag sa phul//dang por byang chub tu ni
492b4(mdo sde): sems bskyed do//bde gshegs tog ni gser mgar khye'u'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i nyi ma la//mar me bzang po bshams te phul nas kyang //dang por
492b5(mdo sde): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs yul 'khor me tog rtswa 'tshong che//de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus brtan pa yi//'chag sa rtswa yis khebs par
492b6(mdo sde): bkramA nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs chos kyi blo gros tshong ngus pa yi tshe//tshong ngus par srang dag ni phyag dar byas nas kyang //
492b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa blo yi 'od ldan de la ni//dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs klung shugs ltar gshegs d+hing ta khye'u yi tshe//
493a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan grags pa de la ni//bsil yab dag gis g.yab pa dag ni byas nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems/
493a2(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs legs bsams grags pa gtar mkhan tshwa//de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i blo de la//nor bu skar 'od dag ni phul nas kyang //
493a3(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs snang ldan rgyal po'i pho nya'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa dpag med lnga//lan gsum bskor ba dag ni
493a4(mdo sde): byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa lha tshogs 'khor sbyar blo mchog tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i mche ba
493a5(mdo sde): lo//gser dang byu ru dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshogs yon tan bsrungs pa 'gron po'i tshe//lam srang dag tu
493a6(mdo sde): rdo stegs btsugs nas kyang //de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mthu rtsal lo//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs don gyi blo gros lnga
493a7(mdo sde): mngon shes pa po//bram ze'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa lha mchog gi/zhabs la mgo bo dog gis phyag dag btsalo nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni
493b1(mdo sde): sems bskyed do//bde gshegs bsnyengs med chu dka' srung ba'i tshe//nyin zhag bdun du byams pa bsgoms nas kyang //de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs
493b2(mdo sde): gnas la//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa grogs brten gos 'tshong tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi mchod rten la//khang
493b3(mdo sde): brtsegs mon dar dag gis bkab pa phul//dong por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs 'od gnas mtshungs pa dge slong tshe//dam chos yongs su
493b4(mdo sde): gzung phyir spro bskyed nas//de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi 'od zer la//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs nor zhabs tshong dpon bur gyur
493b5(mdo sde): de bzhin go shegs pa rgyal bar dgyes de la//me tog ut+pal chang pa gang gtor nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs thar pa'i
493b6(mdo sde): gzi brjid grong dpon bu mo'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i rgyal mtshan de la ni//bsod snyoms dang po dag ni dbul ba byos nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang
493b7(mdo sde): chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa ngos bzang byugs rdzi'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od de la//zhun mar dag ni dbul ba byas nas
494a1(mdo sde): kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs blo bzang phyug po'i bu tshe sangs rgyas kyi//dge slong kha ton 'don par bza' ba
494a2(mdo sde): byin nas kyang //de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mchog ma de la ni//dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs kun gzigs rab byung zhag
494a3(mdo sde): bdun dge slong tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi ngad ldan bcom ldan gyis//lagros par gsungs la rjes su yi rang phul nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu
494a4(mdo sde): ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs ye shes mchog ni dge slong tshe//ting 'dzin 'di la yi rang byas nas kyang //de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mthu rtsol lnga//dang
494a5(mdo sde): por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs gnas rgyal bu'i tshe//de bzhin ga shegs pa blo gros khyad par la//yan lag lnga ldan sil snyan
494a6(mdo sde): ngadag gis mchod//dang poraro byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa bden gsung khyim bdag tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gsal de la//
494a7(mdo sde): lhung bzed 'o mas bkang ste phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin goshegs pa blo bzang sman pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa
494b1(mdo sde): rin chen sgron de lnga//a ru ra yi 'bras bu dgu phul nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs stobs byin tshong dpon bur gyur tshe//de bzhin
494b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa gzi brjid 'bar ba yi//gtsug lag khang ni skyang nul phyogs nas kyang //dong por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshigs srung ge'i stabs ni
494b3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i tshong pa'i tshe//de bzhin glashegs pa gzigs pa tho ma de la ni//byu ru sbyar ba bkang ste gautor ba byas nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
494b4(mdo sde): bde gshegs me tog tog ni rgyal rigs gzhon nu'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig la dgyes pA de la ni//rin po che yi phreng bdag ni phul nas kyang //drang po nyid
494b5(mdo sde): du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs ye shes 'byung gnas phreng rgyud che//de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa mdzes dra la//pad+ma'i rdzing bu dag ni phul nas
494b6(mdo sde): kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs me tog byin pa gnas brten tshe//bde gshegs yon tan dpal gyi snying po yi//'chag sar 'ji ba'i
494b7(mdo sde): gong bu phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs yon tan snying po drang srong tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa gsal de la//rgyang
495a1(mdo sde): ma nas ni thal sbyar phyag byas te//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rin chen grags pa shing tog tshe//de bzhin gshegs
495a2(mdo sde): pa mdangs stobs de la ni//a ti mr-ig ti'i me tog gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde geshegs grags pa rmad byung rdza mkhan gyi//
495a3(mdo sde): bu tshe bde gshegs rnam dag spyan de la//chu yi sbyin pa dag ni phul nas kyang //drang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs mi tshugs dmangs
495a4(mdo sde): rigs khye'u yi che//de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtul zhugs la//ba ru ra yi 'bras bu gcig phul nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde
495a5(mdo sde): gshegs bsnyengs med rgyal chen rnam thos bu yi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa zhabs dag brtan pa de la ni//lha rdzas dag gi tsan+dan dag gis gtor nas kyang //dang
495a6(mdo sde): por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od ni rgyal po yi//mdun 'don byed tshe bde gshegs 'phags spyan de//zhag bdun bar du gdugs
495a7(mdo sde): tshod gsol nas kyang //dngo por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs tshangs par gshegs pa mnyan pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa dgyes de
495b1(mdo sde): la//chu bo'i 'gram dag bstan cing mtshon nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs lha yi mthu rtsal tshong dpon tshe//phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun
495b2(mdo sde): sgo khang phub nas kyang //de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs chen de la ni//drang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs ye shes dgyes pa rdo mkhan tshe//
495b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor mchog de la//lha yi zhal zas dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa lha
495b4(mdo sde): bden sman 'tshong pa yi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa legs par spyod pa'i 'od de ni//snyun gyi gsos smon dag la rtag tu spyan drangos nas//dang po nyid du byang chub tu
495b5(mdo sde): ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs nor bu'i snying po nya pa yi//khye'u tshe bde gshegs sa ri las de la//me tog bzhi zhig dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang
495b6(mdo sde): chub tu ni se mos bskyed do//bde gshegs yon tan grags pa dka' spyod che//de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gsal de la//zhugs ling dag ni dbul bo byas
495b7(mdo sde): nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs ye shes dpal ni bca' ba mkhan gyi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad grags
496a1(mdo sde): de la//lhung bzed bca' ba dag gis bkang ste phul nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs bcings med
496a2(mdo sde): rten bcas gcig pu'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i mchog de la//gdugs tshod gsol tsho sbrang ma bskrad nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
496a3(mdo sde): bde gshegs brtul zhugs brtan pa blon chen tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par gzigs de la//khyad pa dag gi dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byeng
496a4(mdo sde): chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs lha yi gzi brjid dam chos nub pa'i tshe//dge slong chos sgra smros shig smros shig ces brjod nas//de bzhin
496a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa zla ba lto bur gsung de la//dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs tshangs par thub pa rgyal po'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa
496a6(mdo sde): bla mra'i dbyangs de la//grong khyer dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs ngal bzhud dge slong rkyen pa'i tshe//de
496a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dpal de la//so bi ra ka'i btung ba phul nos kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs brtul zhugs
496b1(mdo sde): dka' thub phyag dar pa yi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bsdu ba mkhyen pa po de yi//lam srung khru bcu srid du phyag dar byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
496b2(mdo sde): /dadog shegs 'od zer phung po khyim bdag tshe//de bzhin glo shegs pa mtshan gyi rgyal po de//'jigs pa med por dgon par spyan drangs nas//dang por byang chub tu
496b3(mdo sde): ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs gzi brjid chen po rgyal bu'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa rims nad med pa yi//blo mnga' dri la rgyan dag phul nas kyang //dang
496b4(mdo sde): byor byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs tsam+ba ka ni rgyal phran tsha//de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa dul ba la//u sni ka dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang
496b5(mdo sde): por byang chub tu ni sems bskyod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mdzad bram ze'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi lha de la//ril ba spyi blugs dog ni phul nas kyang //
496b6(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs tshogs can bzang po lha'i bu'i che//de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bdud rtsi des//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
496b7(mdo sde): tshe legaso pa phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mchod sdong srung ba'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med
497a1(mdo sde): pa grong khyer du//gshegs pa'i tshe na mchod stong dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa
497a2(mdo sde): dgyes chen sman pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i phung po la//sman gyi reng bu dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde
497a3(mdo sde): gshegs sna ma'i me tog 'od ni gar mkhan tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od ldan de la ni//sna ma'i me tog dag gi phreng ba phul nas kyang //dang po nyid
497a4(mdo sde): du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs tshogs can 'od ni chang 'tshong tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra de la ni//phye mas bsgos pa'i me tog
497a5(mdo sde): gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa snyun mdzad shing lha'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i nyi ma la//me tog
497a6(mdo sde): dkar ni ka dag gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs mdangs 'gro shing rta mkhan gyi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mi bstongs
497a7(mdo sde): thob de la//bzhugs khri'u dag ni dbul po byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs don legs nges ni rdza mkhan tshe//de
497b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa dgyes de la//zhag gcig bzhugs pa'i gnas ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs khyu
497b2(mdo sde): mchog blon che'i bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa blo mi 'khrul de la//seng ge'i gdan khri dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do///
497b3(mdo sde): 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po nyi shu lnga pa//bde gshegs lag bzang thams cad byed pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa
497b4(mdo sde): 'gro la dga' de la//gos kyi dum bu dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs 'od zer chen po lag bla'i tshe//de bzhin
497b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa lha yi mchog de la//kyu ru ra dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs bsam pas byin ni khrus pa'i tshe//
497b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul mchog de la//phyag dag bkru ba'i cha ba ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs bsod nams 'od
497b7(mdo sde): ni dbul po'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi gdugs de la//bshos dron bcud dang ldan po phul nas kyang //dong por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde
498a1(mdo sde): gshegs rin chen dbyangs ni ri mo mkhan gyi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan dag ni byis nas kyang //de bzhin gshugs pa klu
498a2(mdo sde): yi 'od ldan de la ni//dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rdo rje'i sden bcings pa med pa po//ral pa can gyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs
498a3(mdo sde): pablo//mthu rtsal dag shul can la rdo leb phul nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor ldan phreng rgyud che//de
498a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gzi brjid la//tsam+ba ka yi phreng ba phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs seng ge'i stobs ni phyag
498a5(mdo sde): dar pa yi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i mtha' ni gzigs pa po//bcom ldan do ni phrag par blangs te 'dom rdzab bsgral//dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni snyoms
498a6(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs dri med spyan ni 'dri mkhan che//de bzhin gshegs pa khrel yod bzang po la//ka la man ngag dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang
498a7(mdo sde): chub du ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs 'od srung sbyangs gnas dge slong tshe//bde gshegs rgya chen gzugs kyi 'chags dag/lhung bzed 'bru mar bkod
498b1(mdo sde): byas chag chug btab//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa blo gsal rgyal bu'i chu//de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi spyan de la//'od zer ma
498b2(mdo sde): tog dag ni phul nas kyang //dong por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs ye shes 'gros ni rgya mtsho'i tshong pa'i tshe//nyam thag tshun sangs rgyas dag la
498b3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal zhes//tshig tu brjod nas bde gshegs tshogs kyi 'od zer la//dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//badre gshegs gzi brjid drag shul mgar
498b4(mdo sde): ba'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i mchog de la//dngul las byas pa'i lhung bzed phul nas kyang //drang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
498b5(mdo sde): 'od zer chen po tshong dpon bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam por bzhag pa'i bdag nyid de//nyin gcig bzhugs pa'i gnas ni byas te phul nas kyang //dang po
498b6(mdo sde): nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs nyi 'od grong rdal byis pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan tog de yi//ras kyi gdan dag gding ba byas
498b7(mdo sde): nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gsheg so dri med 'od ni mdun 'don tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa skye dbang mtshungs de la//mchod sbyin
499a1(mdo sde): dag gi rab phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs gzi brjid rnam 'byes chang 'tshong tshe//de bzhin gshegs
499a2(mdo sde): pa 'jigs med ba shis gnyen la//kha ra'i btung ba dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs khengs med rtsis pa'i khye'u
499a3(mdo sde): yi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bsdu ba'i blo mnga' la//ci ci'i phub ma phrag ste gang phul nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs sbrang rtsi'i
499a4(mdo sde): zhal ni lham mkhan tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra thul de la ni//me tog ut+pal dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
499a5(mdo sde): zla 'od rten bcas nad pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa zam pa'i 'od de la//mon sran gre'u rul pa phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin
499a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa glog sbyin rgyal po'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo brtsegs pa la//yid 'thang khang pa brtsegs pa phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
499a7(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs rab zhir gshegs pa shing 'tshong tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa rtse gcig 'od de la//chu dron snod dag bkang ste phul nas kyang //dang
499b1(mdo sde): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs mi 'khrugs pa yis dge slong dag la ni//ji srid 'tsho bar gnod sems med par 'dzin bcug nas//de bzhin
499b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa sred med bu yi mthu rdul la//dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs dgra bcom grags pa rdza mkhan tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa
499b3(mdo sde): seng ge'i zhabs de la//spos kyi za ma tog ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs chos kyi yon tan phywa mkhan tshe//de bzhin
499b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa tshul khrims dgyes de la//khang pa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//badre gshegs zhing bzang lha yi brtul zhugs
499b5(mdo sde): tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsal de la//gu gul bdug pa dag gis bdugaso nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
499b6(mdo sde): bkod pa'i rgyal po 'khor sbyar tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la//bai DUr+ya yi khang bzang phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde
499b7(mdo sde): gshegs mngon 'phags lha la dad pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa seng gi rnam bsgyings la//me tog dag las byas po'i gdugs phul nas//dang por byang
500a1(mdo sde): chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs sbyin sreg 'od 'phro ded dpon tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rnyog med la//bkang sa dag
500a2(mdo sde): ni byas te phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs pad dpal phyug po'i bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa gsul
500a3(mdo sde): ba po//bde bar gshegs la pad+ma'i me tog gtor//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rin chen bkod pa khyim bdag che//de bzhin
500a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa nges pa'i blo de la//khron pa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs shin tu bzang po lam ston
500a5(mdo sde): bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa gra ti mug spangs po de la ni//ljon pa'i lcug ma nyi shu snyed ni phul nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
500a6(mdo sde): do//bde gshegs rin rgan mchog ni shing rta mkhan gyi tshe/bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phung po de'i//gtsug log khrung gi sgo dag byas te
500a7(mdo sde): phul nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde ga shigs thugs ni shin tu gzhungs pa phyugs rdzi'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bsdu
500b1(mdo sde): ba'i blo ni mnga' ba de//lAm srang dag tu gshegs cho gos dag bting nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rgya mtshos byin ni
500b2(mdo sde): mdun 'don tshe//de bzhin ge shegs pa skal ldan shing rta la//me tog dag gi gzhal med khang pa phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//dri bzhin
500b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa tshangs tog zhing pa'i tshe//de bzhin ge shegs pa bden pa'i mthu rtsal la//mon sran gre'u 'bru spar gang gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
500b4(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs zla gdugs nI ra yu h+ya ka'i tshe//de bzhin gshugs pa sna tshogs gsung de la//byug pa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang byor
500b5(mdo sde): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs 'od 'phro spos 'tshod gyur pa'i tshe//bde gshegs phyogs rnams gzigs pa sangs rgyas kyi//gtsug lag khang dgra spos
500b6(mdo sde): kyis bdugs nus kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa dri mang rgyal po ni//ri mo mkhan tshe bde gshegs ston gsal de'i//sgo
500b7(mdo sde): gang dag ni ri mo bris nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs ye shes grags pa gos 'tshong che//de bzhin gshegs pa nges
501a1(mdo sde): par rtog bzod la//chos gos sra brkyang dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs kun rgyal tshong dpon
501a2(mdo sde): bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gdugs de la//rin chen se mo do dag phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
501a3(mdo sde): yon tan 'od ni mthing mkhan tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyis mi thub la//mthing phor gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni
501a4(mdo sde): sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa sgra bsgrags gos 'tshong tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi me tog la//skra rags dag ni dbul ba byos nas kyang //
501a5(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs zla rgyal phyugs rdzi'i dpon po'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi pad+ma la//chur ba dag ni dbul ba
501a6(mdo sde): byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs pad+ma'i 'od zer bram ze yi//rgyal gtso'i bu tshe bde gshegs kun gzi la//hi
501a7(mdo sde): dem pa ra dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs brtul zhugs bzang po snod sbyar mkhan gyi tshe//de bzhin gshegs
501b1(mdo sde): pabazla ba'i 'od ldan de la ni//'bras drus snyim bya gang drug dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang blo nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyod do//bde gA shogs sgron rgyal bca'
501b2(mdo sde): ba mkhan gyi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i tshogs can la//snum khur dag ni dbul po byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde
501b3(mdo sde): gshegs glog gi tog ni ded dpon tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa don ni dgongs pa la//na bza' phyogs gcig cig ni phul nos kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
501b4(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs 'od zer rgyal po'i rdza mkhan tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi rgyal po la//khrus rkyen bum pa dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni
501b5(mdo sde): sems bskyed do//bde gshegs skar mkhan tshal gyi las byed tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i zhal de la//lo ma'i gding ba dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang
501b6(mdo sde): chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs grags rdzogs nor bu 'tshong pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa snyan par dgongs de la//rin po che yi bla bre phul nas kyang //
501b7(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs pad snying stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa ljon pa'i rgyal mtshan de la ni//dri
502a1(mdo sde): bsung ldan pa'i skyed mos tshul dag phul nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rgyal ni 'khor los sbyar ba'i
502a2(mdo sde): tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dog de la ni//rin chen gdugs ni bye ba stong snyed phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs spyan
502a3(mdo sde): mdzes grong dpon bu mo'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa steng ge'i mthu rtsal la//me long dang ni bla bre phu lo nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
502a4(mdo sde): bde gshegs rnyog pa med don shing srungs che//de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi gtso de la//tshims shing dag ni dbul ba byos nas kyang //dang por byang chub
502a5(mdo sde): tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs drag shul sde ni khye'u yi tshe//dri bzhin gshegs pa spos dang zhim po la//phyag dor snyim pa gang zhig phul nas kyang //
502a6(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs bsod nams gzi brjid lci 'tshong tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pas bsngags de la//lhung
502a7(mdo sde): bzed bkru phyir lci ba'i gong bu phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs mthu rtsal can ni rtswa 'tshong tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bsod
502b1(mdo sde): nams mu stegs la//rtswa khur dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs thogs med blo ni mgar ba'i tshe//
502b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa shes rab 'od de la//mtshon cha dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs sku gcan lha ni
502b3(mdo sde): lkugs mgar gyi//khye'u yi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po//ye shes go cha la ni khab phul nos//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
502b4(mdo sde): ye shes phung po 'dreg mkhan tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs stobs de la ni//sreg shang dag cig dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
502b5(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs kha lo sbyar ba dbul po'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjed dag shul la//mchil lam rim gcig pa dag phul nas kyang //
502b6(mdo sde): drang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs skye dbang mtshungs ni grong khyer na//brten che bde gshegs sangs rgyas dgyes de la//mon sran gre'u dag
502b7(mdo sde): gis gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs me tog tog ni rgyal gtso yi//khye'u yi tshe na bde gshegs gsal rgyal la//mchil
503a1(mdo sde): ma'i snod ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs sgra gcan 'dzin ni 'dreg mkhan tshe//de bzhin
503a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa po//bcom ldan de yi sen mo bcad nas kyang //dngango por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//badre gshegs ci sman chen po
503a3(mdo sde): thags mkhan tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis rnam gnon la//ras kyi kha tshar dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde
503a4(mdo sde): gshegs rgyu skar rgyal po tshong 'dus pa yi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa don ni legs par dgongs de la//bum pa mar gyis bkang ba dag ni phul nos kyang //dang
503a5(mdo sde): po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//byed gshegs sman pa'i rgyal po tshong dpon bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po chen po de la ni//lha yi khang
503a6(mdo sde): bzang dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs bsod nams glang po 'bru mar gyi//mkhan tshe de bzhin
503a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'phags dul la//zhabs bsku ba dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gishegs gcod mdzad smad
503b1(mdo sde): 'tshong bu mo'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa gsal de la//me long dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs/
503b2(mdo sde): rnam grags rgyal po khrus pa yi//khye'u tshe byad gshegs da smra ba'i blo mnga' la//'dag pa'i tshal dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
503b3(mdo sde): do//bde gshegs nyi mA'i 'od zer dge sbyong dbyar gnas pa'o//re mye gro pa tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan pa//de la khrus chu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //
503b4(mdo sde): dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa chos mdzad dka' thub can gyi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen gnas su phyin pa la//mtshan
503b5(mdo sde): mo mar me dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs blo gros bzang po sman pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa seng
503b6(mdo sde): ge'i nga rol//a r+ya ro dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni soms bskyed do//bdag shugs yon tan dbang mtshungs cu thun tshe//de bzhin
503b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa kun tu rin chen la//b+hod kra ka ri dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rdo rje'i sde ni tshong pa'i tshe//de bzhin
504a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'jig rten kun dga' lnga//lhung bzed sbyang rjes bkang ste phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bra
504a2(mdo sde): gshegs shes rab brtsegs ni rngon pa'i che//de bzhin gshegs pa b+ha rA ga rdo rje yi//lam snang dag ni mtshan pa byos nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
504a3(mdo sde): bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa legs gnas bramade bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i dbyangs de la//bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/
504a4(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa d+mo sbyangs phreng rgyung rtse//de bzhin gshegs pa skur ma'i stobs de lo//snga mo'i mye tog bdun zhig
504a5(mdo sde): phrul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde ga shegs tshangs dbyangs lam ston khye'u yi che//de bzhin gshegs pa ded dpon de la ni//gser
504a6(mdo sde): gyi me tog dag ni gtar nus thong //dang por byang chub rje ni sems bskyed do//bde go shegs yin ton mchog ni zhing pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mi yizla
504a7(mdo sde): bal//bal sran sngon po spar gang gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs 'brug sgra dbyangs ni rtsis pa yi//khye
504b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa bkod chen la//phreng ba'i chun po dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs mngon shes tog ni rigs
504b2(mdo sde): gtso'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de la//dar dang bdug pa dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa
504b3(mdo sde): tog 'od rgyal bu'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes dang ldan pa yi//zhabs gnyis dag ni bkru ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de
504b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dge ba khyim bdag che//bde gshegs srid mtha' nor bu'i spos de la//dgun sman sbyar thug dag ni gsol nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni
504b5(mdo sde): sems bskyed do//bde gshegs tshangs pa mthing bu 'tshong ba'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa zhi bar gnas de la//mthing bu'i nor bu dag ni phul nas kyang //dang
504b6(mdo sde): bor byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs skyes mchog tshod dpon bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa bsdus de la//gur kum dag ni dbul ba byas
504b7(mdo sde): nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs spyan sdug spos 'tshong khye'u yi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i mchod de
505a1(mdo sde): la//spos kyi phye ma spar gang gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs klus sbyin rdza mkhan chung ma'i tshe/
505a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro chen po la//chu yis bkang ba'i snod dag phul nos kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa bden
505a3(mdo sde): tog tshang dpon tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa dgyes de la//gser gyi khri stan dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin
505a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa brgyan pa spos 'tshong tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa gsal de la//spos kyi phur ma dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
505a5(mdo sde): do//bde gshegs zhum med dbyangs ni lcags mgar che//de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam mtha' yas la//lcags las byas pa'i snod dag phul nus kyang //
505a6(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rin chen 'od ni ded dpon tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i 'od zer la//spos kyi rdo gu dag gis bdugs
505a7(mdo sde): nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs ni byin pa yis//de bzhin gshegs pa lta bar bzod de la//dpyid ka/
505b1(mdo sde): chab brom gong bu phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyod do//bde gshegs seng ge dag ni mgar ba'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa me tog chen po la//
505b2(mdo sde): de la kheb dgu dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs 'od zer sna tshogs sha na mkhan gyi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa
505b3(mdo sde): bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid de la ni//sha na dag los byas pa'i na bza' phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs ye shes dpa' bo
505b4(mdo sde): glong rdal gyi//khye'u tshe de bzhin gshegs pa blo gsol la//la du dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs pad+ma'i
505b5(mdo sde): snying po rtsis pa yiso//khye'u tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas blo la//me tog snyim po bkang ste gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//ba di
505b6(mdo sde): gshegs me tog rgyas po lag bla'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs po nor sbyin de la ni//dus mu yin par bcud ldan btung ba phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems
505b7(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs mthu rtsal stobs ni ral pa can//sbyin sreg mkhan tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po//zhum med dbyangs la zhugs ling phul nas kyang //
506a1(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs bsod nams phung po tshong pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs de la//
506a2(mdo sde): lhung bzed sbrang rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs gzugs mchog grong khyer bsrung ba'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs
506a3(mdo sde): pa zla ba bzang po la//btung ba byin gyis brlabs pa phul nos kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa skar mkhan spos 'chang che/
506a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i gzugs de la//spos kyi rgyu dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //drang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs zla ba'i sgron ma
506a5(mdo sde): slongs mo'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa rnal 'byor sems dpa' la//mgron bu nyi shu dag ni gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde
506a6(mdo sde): gshegs gzi brjid phung po rtswa thun tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa zab mor gnas de la//rtswa las byas pa'i gdugs dag phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni
506a7(mdo sde): sems bskyed do//bde gshegs byang chub rgyal po shing rta yi//mkhan tshe de bzhin gshegaso pa dpal 'od la//shing rta dag ni dbul ba byos nas kyang //
506b1(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs mi zad shing rta mkhan gyi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu gdul dka' la//bzhugs khri'u dag ni dbul
506b2(mdo sde): ba byas nos kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs mngon rtogs can ni sman pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs de la/
506b3(mdo sde): ldog sman dag ni 'bul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs yan lag rgyas pa phyugs rdzi'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa zla
506b4(mdo sde): ba'i skyon de la//lhung bzed dar bas bkang ste phulo nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs yul 'khor shes rab mar 'tshang tshe/
506b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i dpal de la//zhun mar srang brgyad dag ni phul nas kyang //dong por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa
506b6(mdo sde): mchog ni bong rdzi'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i gdugs de la//bzhugs pa'i rdo gdan ngag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
506b7(mdo sde): bde gshegs gzi brjid tshim mdzad rgyal bu'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i mu stegs la//se'u 'bru dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang
507a1(mdo sde): chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde ga shegs shes rab byin ni mur 'tshong tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i dpal de la//mar khu
507a2(mdo sde): dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs rdza mkhan tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa rin
507a3(mdo sde): chen mchog de lo//ril ba chu yis bkang ste phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa mgon po rigs bu'i tshe//bang
507a4(mdo sde): gshegs bzang po ngo tsha mkhyen pa la//'chag sa dag ni byas te phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs chags med mdzod ni mi
507a5(mdo sde): bkren tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar bzod de la//tshod ma'i gong bu dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
507a6(mdo sde): gtso bos byin ni lha yi bu//dbang phyug tshe ni dri bzhin gshegs pa po//seng ge'i nga ro de la bstud nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin
507a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa gtso bo spos 'tshong tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal chen po la//spos lo'i ri lu dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
507b1(mdo sde): ngodo//bde gshegs ye shes mthu rdul shing bskyung rgyo//de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gsal de la//ko bi dA ra'i me tog phul nas kyang //dang por byang
507b2(mdo sde): chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro dge slong che//de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs kyi snod de lta//bu ram chu dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //
507b3(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po khyim bdag tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal de la//skyed mos tshal dag dbul
507b4(mdo sde): ba byas nos kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshugs shugs 'chang tshong dpon bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs po mnyam par gnas pa
507b5(mdo sde): po//de la gdugs dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe//bde
507b6(mdo sde): gshegs kun gyi blo de 'khor bca so ther 'brum dag/dbyar gnas chen phongs pa med pas spyan drangs nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin
507b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'od bzeng tshong pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal chen po la//sbrang rtsi cotso bzhed pa dag phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
508a1(mdo sde): bde gshegs grags byin 'dzam gling rgyal ba'i che//de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i tog de yi//gtsug lag khang ni bye ba byas nas kyang //drung
508a2(mdo sde): por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs po gzugs bzang spos 'tshang tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs brtan dA la//spos ni srang gi
508a3(mdo sde): bzhi che phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub du ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po gser rtog tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi mchod de la//khron pa
508a4(mdo sde): chu yis gang ba phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni semos bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa don grub bram ze'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa thal bar klog de la/
508a5(mdo sde): mchod sbyin chen po dag ni byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs song ge'i sde ni dbang blon gyi//bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa
508a6(mdo sde): glags mchog la//spyod mos tshal dag dbul ba byos nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs nor lha'i bu ni tshong dpon bu mo'i tshe/
508a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'o//de la zhal bkru bo dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//nga gshegs
508b1(mdo sde): grags pa rgyal ba'i btsun mo'i rgyu//de bzhin gshegs pa blo brtan de lA nI//rang gi rgyan rnams ngag ni gtor nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//'di
508b2(mdo sde): gshegs rgyal ba rgyal po'i bu mo'i tshe//de bzhin gsheg sgru pa bdud rtsi'i 'od zer can//de lnga thod dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub du ni sems bskyed
508b3(mdo sde): do//bde gshegs rgya chen snying po tshong pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs can de la ni//mu tig dag los byas pa'i gdugs phu lo nas//dang por byang
508b4(mdo sde): chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs bsod nams 'od zer lcags srung tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs gsal de lta ni//srog ma dag las byos
508b5(mdo sde): ba'i phreng ba phul//drang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs smang 'don 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen de la ni//lhung
508b6(mdo sde): bzed 'bru myur dag gis bkang ba phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs sgron rgyal rtsis pa'i bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa ma
508b7(mdo sde): rgyal chen po la//me tog 'bras bu dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub du ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs ye shes brtsegs ni ljongs dag gi
509a1(mdo sde): pho nya tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po//bdud rtsi gsal la sbrang rtsi'i btung ba phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs
509a2(mdo sde): pa lha mchog shing srungs tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub mthu rtsal la//ma tu lung ga dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de
509a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa sa bdag khyim bdag che//de bzhin ga shegs pa sgra mchog sems pa la//khang brtsegs gos kyis g.yogs pa dag phul nas//drang por byang
509a4(mdo sde): chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs grol brnyes btso blag mkhan gyi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros drag shul la//ras yug khra bo dag ni phul nas
509a5(mdo sde): kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshigs gtsug gser tshong dpon khye'u yi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa chu lha'i mthu rtsal la//gser
509a6(mdo sde): gyi bum pa dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de//bde gshegs sgra gcan bzang po slong ba'i tshe//de bzhin grushegs pa brtul zhugs
509a7(mdo sde): chen po la//rtswa yi sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs thub dka' go ri ka yi tshe//de bzhin gshegs
509b1(mdo sde): pa'od zer 'bar ba la//gshegs zam dag ni byas te phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa thub gsal dung 'tshong che//
509b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs med blo la//dung dag sbar ba bkang ste phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs zla ba'i 'od
509b3(mdo sde): zer tshong ngus pa'i//khye'u yi tshe bde gshegs song ge'i dbyangs de la//kham por mar khus bkang sti phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde
509b4(mdo sde): gshegs gser 'od tshong dpon bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dgyes de la//mu tig chun phreng dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
509b5(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs lha yi yon tan dbang po blon cha'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa legs par rab tu gnas pa la//dpag tshad gcig pa'i skyed mos tshal
509b6(mdo sde): dgra phul nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa chos gdugs bram ze'i tshe//ri yi rtse mo nas ni bdag mcho ngas nas//de
509b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de la//dad por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs bsod nams lag ni tshong dpon bu mo'i che//bde bar gshegs
510a1(mdo sde): pa bdud rtsi'i sgron ma de la ni//me tog mya ngan 'tshang dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
510a2(mdo sde): chags med spos 'tshong khye'u yi che//de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub stabs de la//sran gre'u phul gsum zhig ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
510a3(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs ye shes gya nom rgyal po yi//pho nya'i tshe na bde gshegs rgyal ba yi//bshes gnyen de la lan cig bskor byas nas//dang por
510a4(mdo sde): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs blo zhib rgyal po'i btsun mo'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa legs par gzigs de la//bum pa chu yis bkang ste
510a5(mdo sde): phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs gzi byin thams cad dad dpon tshe//dge 'dun mang por zhal zas gsol nas kyang //
510a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnyog pa med don la//dngo por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa rtsi sman lag bla'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa
510a7(mdo sde): rtogs pa'i mchog de la//skyu ru ra dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rnam grol tog ni rten bcas che//
510b1(mdo sde): 'dum rngub dag tu zam pa btsugs nas kyang //de bzhin gshegs pa mi yi zla ba lnga//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad
510b2(mdo sde): zhing pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar de la ni//me tog dmar bdag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs pa
510b3(mdo sde): shes rgyal po 'bras sa lu//khur khyer che na bde gshegs kun 'od la//me tog kAr ni ka dag phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin
510b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'jigs mdzad dpa' bo'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po la//rgyal mtshan dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
510b5(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs chu bo spong ni grong rdal byis pa'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa seng go rnam par bsgyings pa yi//stabs la me tog ut+pal dag nr-i gtor
510b6(mdo sde): nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs thogs med grags pa slong ba'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' de la ni//mo
510b7(mdo sde): can dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs bden pa'i phung po chang 'tshong che//de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang
511a1(mdo sde): mtshungs de la//rdzu rnga dang ni lo ma phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs spyan rtswa 'tshong che//
511a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen de la nI//rtswa spyil dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshogs ri dbang mtshungs ni
511a3(mdo sde): rgyal bu'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs//de la gdugs dag dbul ba byos nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//badre gshegs
511a4(mdo sde): chos brtsegs lha yi bsnyen bkur ba//byed che bde gshugs bsod nams brtags pa la//me tog chang pa gang dag phu lo nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems
511a5(mdo sde): bskyed do//bde gshegs thar pa'i gzi brjid de rgyal bu'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu zla ba la//tsag kra ku ra'i 'bras bu brgyad phul naso//dang por byang chub
511a6(mdo sde): tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs legs mdzad gar mkhan bu mo'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa spyan sdug de la ni//ras bal dag gi phreng ba phul nas kyang /
511a7(mdo sde): dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rab zhi sku ni 'phreng rgyud che//de bzhin gshegs pa snyan par grags de la//tsam+ba ka yi phreng ba phul nas
511b1(mdo sde): kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs yid 'ong gsung ni dmag mi'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i dpal de la//ras yug
511b2(mdo sde): dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa blo sbyangs sman pa'i tshe//bde gshegs seng ge'i mche ba dgongs mal
511b3(mdo sde): du//'bru maro dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin goshegs pa chu lha gdugs mkhan tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa
511b4(mdo sde): rin chen mchod 'os la//dus su bsil yab dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs seng ge'i logs ni ded dpon tshe//
511b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dri zhim 'o de la//ston mo chen mo dag ni byas nas kyang //drang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs chos kyi mthu rtsal rgyal bu'i
511b6(mdo sde): tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra zhir gyur pa la//dngul las byas pa'i gdan khri phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
511b7(mdo sde): skal ba bzang po ded dpon tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i sde de la//gser las byas pa'i bla bre phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
512a1(mdo sde): bde gshegs mi 'khrugs mdog ni rdzu mkhan che//de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo de la//rje'u phru dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //drang
512a2(mdo sde): byor byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs gzi brjid rgyal po gleng dpon che//grong khyer dag ni phyag der byas nas kyang //de bzhin go shegs pa gzi brjid
512a3(mdo sde): go blogros la//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs mjed lag bla'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa nges par rtogs bzod la//ka
512a4(mdo sde): ra bI ri'i me tog phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs spyan legs phyugs rdzi'i dpon po'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa zla mchog
512a5(mdo sde): dpal de la//lhung bzed mo ra nasna bkang phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyod do//bde gshegs don gnas blo ni nad pa'i tshe//de bzhin
512a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa glang po'i stabs de yi//nyin mo bzhugs pa'i gnas khang phyogs nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs snang ba'i
512a7(mdo sde): 'od zer lha 'bangs tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa'i gtso de la//mar me'i snying po dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
512b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa spros gaN+DI rgyal po'i che//de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa dgyes de la//ut+pal sngon po gcig cig dul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu na
512b2(mdo sde): sems bskyed do//bdeg shegs kun dga' mdzad pa shing rta mkhan//byed tshe bang gshegs ut+pal dri de la//snum phyis dge byas te phul nas kyang //dang por
512b3(mdo sde): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs don yod gshegs pa log bla'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi dbong phyug lo//lo ma'i spyil bu byas te phul
512b4(mdo sde): nos kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs khro bcom tshong dpon bur gyur tshe//de bzhin gshegs po tsam pa'i mchog de lo//rdzing bu dag ni
512b5(mdo sde): dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang par byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bdi gshegs gzugs mchog tha ga pa yi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs snyoms
512b6(mdo sde): pa la//dbyar gnas drug ni dbul po byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs legs gshegs rol mo mkhan gyi tshe//de bzhin
512b7(mdo sde): gshegs po shis pa'i dpal de la//rol mo'i rje chen brdungs te mchod nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rab sbyin grags pa la
513a1(mdo sde): kus byed tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen po de la ni//'dug pa'i cha la dag sbyar te dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang
513a2(mdo sde): chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gtsang khyim bdag che//de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung de la//bu yug langs tshe 'jams
513a3(mdo sde): dang btung ba phul//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs lha nyi phyugs rdzi'i dpon po'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam las rgal ba la//zhun
513a4(mdo sde): mar ci dgos pa ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs shes rab byin ni phub mkhan che//de bzhin ga shegs pa mtha' yas
513a5(mdo sde): spyan de la//phub dag byas te dbul ba byas nos kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde go shegs mnyam gzhag bdag nyid khyim bdag tshe//de
513a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa blo 'bar de la ni//til 'bru spar ba bkang sti gtor phul nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs gzi mdangs
513a7(mdo sde): 'bru mar spos can mkhan gyi tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'os pa'i dpal de la//sna mo'i me tog yod pa'i 'bru mar srang brgyad phul//dang por byang
513b1(mdo sde): chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal rigs lam ston tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs dbyangs de la//lam srang dag ni mtshon pa byas nas
513b2(mdo sde): kyang /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs skal ldan shing rta bu ram chang mkhan che//de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dmigs pa byin dra la//
513b3(mdo sde): skyu ru ra yi bcud khu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa gser mchog tshwa 'tshong tshe//de bzhin
513b4(mdo sde): go shegs pa gtsang myur gnas de dag/zla ba gsum du tshwa la spyan drangs nas//drang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs rnam grol gtsug shing
513b5(mdo sde): srung ba'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa dri zhim spos de la//dgun 'bru'i bcud khu dag ni phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs chos
513b6(mdo sde): ldan yur ba mkhan gyi tshe//yur ba dag ni brkos te byas nas kyang //de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
513b7(mdo sde): spos gnas tshong dpon chung ma'i tshe//de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo'i phung po la//dbyar gnas ngag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//

514a7(mdo sde): ka ra gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs//snang ba'i gtso la a ba kan phul nas//dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bad gshegs yul 'khor tog ni tshong
514b1(mdo sde): pa'i tshe//bde gshegs sna tshogs dbyangs brgyan de lta ni//ba so'i khang pa btsugs pa phul nas kyang //dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//bde gshegs
